GE07bhg4c02u:1364: tathā ca gautamaḥ smarati na doṣo hiṃsāyām āhave 'nyatra vyaśvāsārathyanuyudha-kṛtāñjali-prakīrṇa-keśa-parāṅmukhopaviṣṭa-sthala-vṛkṣārūḍha-dūta-go-brāhmaṇa-vādibhyaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1366: etac ca sarvaṃ svadharmam api cāvekṣyety atra spaṣṭīkariṣyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1367: tathā ca yuddha-lakṣaṇe 'rthe 'gnihotrādivad vihitatvād aparihārye parihartum aśakye tad-akaraṇe pratyavāya-prasaṅgāt tvam adṛṣṭa-duḥkha-bhayena
GE07bhg4c02u:1369: yadi tu yuddhākhyaṃ karma kāmyam eva -
GE07bhg4c02u:1371: akūṭair āyudhair yānti te svargaṃ yogino yathā // [Yajñ. 13.324]
GE07bhg4c02u:1373: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:1374: tadāpi prārabdhasya kāmyasyāpi avaśya-parisamāpanīyatvena nitya-tulyatvāt tvayā ca yuddhasya prārabdhatvād aparihāryatvaṃ tyulyam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1375: athavātma-nityatva-pakṣa eva śloka-dvayam arjunasya paramāstikasya veda-bāhya-matābhyupagamāsambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1376: akṣara-yojanā tu nityaś cāsau dehendriyādi-sambandha-vaśāj jātaś ceti nitya-jātas
GE07bhg4c02u:1377: tam enam ātmānaṃ nityam api santaṃ jātaṃ cen manyase tathā nityam api santaṃ mṛtaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1378: cen manyase tathāpi tvaṃ nānuśocitum arhasīti hetum āha jātasya hīty ādinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1383: hi yasmāt tasya svārambhaka-karma-kṣaye mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1384: mṛtasya ca tad-deha-kṛtena karmaṇā janmāpi dhruvam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1385: aparihārye 'rthe iti mṛtyur janma ca parihartum a]cakyam eva ity arthaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c02u:1388: pūrva-śarīrendriya-viyogas tu maraṇaṃ tad-ubhayaṃ ca dharmādharma-hetukatvāt tad-āśrayasya nityasyātmano mukhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1390: tasyānityasya kṛta-hānya-kṛtābhyāgama-prasaṅgena tad-āśrayatvānupapatter iti tārkikā manyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1393: jātasya sva-karma-vaśāt prāpta-śarīrādi-yogasya nityasyāpy ātmanas tad-ārambhaka-karma-kṣaya-hetuko mṛtyur dhruvo niścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1394: mṛtasya tac-charīra-kṛta-karma-hetukaṃ janma ca dhruvaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1395: tasmād evam aparihārye parihartum aśakye janma-maraṇātmake 'rthe tvaṃ vidvān śocituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1396: tvayi yuddhān nivṛtte 'py ete svārambhake karmaṇi kṣīṇe sati mariṣyanty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1402: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca dehānāṃ svabhāvaṃ paryālocya tad-upādhike ātmano janma-maraṇe śoko na kārya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1405: tad eva ādir utpatteḥ pūrva-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyaktādīni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1408: tathā vyaktam abhivyaktaṃ madhyaṃ janma-maraṇāntarālaṃ sthiti-lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni vyakta-madhyāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1409: avyakte nidhanaṃ layo yeṣāṃ tānīmāny evaṃ-bhūtāny eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1412: pratibuddhasya svapna-dṛṣṭa-vastuṣv iva śoko na yujyata ity arthaḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1414: tad evaṃ sarva-prakāreṇātmano 'śocyatvam upapāditam athedānīm ātmano 'śocyatve 'pi bhūta-saṅghātātmakāni śarīrāṇy uddiśya śocāmīty arjunāśaṅkām apanudati bhagavān avyaktādīnīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1415: ādau janmanaḥ prāg-avyaktāni anupalabdhāni bhūtāni pṛthivyādi-bhūta-mayāni śarīrāṇi madhye janmānantaraṃ maraṇāt prāg-vyaktāni upalabdhāni santi
GE07bhg4c02u:1417: yathā svapnendrajālādau pratibhāsa-mātra-jīvanāni śukti-rūpyādivan na tu jñānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ vā sthitāni dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭy-abhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1418: tathā ca - ādāv ante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā [ṃā. Kā. 2.6] iti nyāyena madhye 'pi na santy evaitāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1419: nāsato vidyate bhāvaḥ [Gītā 2.16] iti prāg-ukteś ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:1420: evaṃ sati tatra teṣu mithyā-bhūteṣv atyanta-tuccheṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevanā ko vā duḥkha-pralāpo na ko 'py ucita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1421: na hi svapne vividhān bandhūn upalabhya pratibuddhas tad-vicchedena śocati pṛthag-jano 'pi etad evoktaṃ purāṇe adarśanād āpatitaḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gataḥ bhūta-saṅgha iti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1422: tathā ca śarīrāṇy apy uddiśya śoko nocita iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1424: avyaktam avyākṛtam avidyopahita-caitanyam ādiḥ prāg avasthā yeṣāṃ tāni tathā vyaktaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1425: nāma-rūpābhyām evāvidyakābhyāṃ prakaṭībhūtaṃ na tu svena paramārtha-sadātmanā madhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1426: sthity-avasthā yeṣāṃ tādṛśāni bhūtāni ākāśādīni avyakta-nidhanāny evāvyakte sva-kāraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:1427: mṛd iva ghaṭādīnāṃ nidhanaṃ pralayo yeṣāṃ teṣu bhūteṣu kā paridevaneti pūrvavat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1428: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad dhedaṃ tarhy avyākṛtam āsīt tan-nāma-rūpābhyām eva vyākriyata [BAU 1.4.7] ity ādir avyaktopādānatāṃ sarvasya prapañcasya darśayati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1429: laya-sthānatvaṃ tu tasyārtha-siddhaṃ kāraṇa eva kārya-layasya darśanāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1431: tathā cājñāna-kalpitatvena tucchāny ākāśādi-bhūtāny apy uddiśya śoko nocitaś cet tat-kāryāṇy
GE07bhg4c02u:1432: uddiśya nocita iti kim u vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1433: athavā sarvadā teṣām avyakta-rūpeṇa vidyamānatvād vicchedābhāvena tan-nimittaḥ pralāpo nocita ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1434: bhāratety anena sambodhayan śuddha-vaṃśodbhavatvena śāstrīyam arthaṃ pratipattum arho 'si kim iti na pratipadyasa iti sūcayati //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1436: tad evaṃ na jāyate na mriyate ity-ādinā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1437: deha-pakṣe ca jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyuḥ ity anena śoka-viṣayaṃ nirākṛtya idānīm ubhaya-pakṣe 'pi nirākaroti avyakteti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1439: avyaktāni na vyaktaṃ vyaktir ādau janma-pūrva-kāle yeṣāṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1440: kintu tadānīm api liṅga-dehaḥ sthūla-dehaś ca svārambhaka-pṛthivy-ādi-sattvāt kāraṇātmanā vartamāno 'spaṣṭam āsīd evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1442: na vyakti nidhanād anantaraṃ yeṣāṃ tāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1443: mahā-pralaye 'pi karma-mātrādīnāṃ sattvāt sūkṣma-rūpeṇa bhūtāni santy eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1444: tasmāt sarva-bhūtāni ādy-antarayor avyaktāni madhye vyaktānīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1445: yad uktaṃ śrutibhiḥ - sthira-cara-jātayaḥ syur ajayottha-nimitta-yujaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1448: yan manyase dhruvaṃ lokam adhruvaṃ vā na cobhayam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1449: sarvathā na hi śocyās te snehād anyatra mohajāt // [BhP 1.13.44] iti //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1450: baladevaḥ : atha dehātma-pakṣe ātmātirikta-deha-pakṣe ca deha-vināśa-hetuka-śoko na yuktas tad-ārambhakāṇāṃ bhūta-mātrāṇām avināśād ity āha avyaktādīnīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1451: avyaktaṃ nāma-rūpa-virahāt sūkṣmaṃ pradhānam ādi ādi-rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni avyakta-nidhanāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1452: avyakte tādṛśi pradhāne nidhanaṃ nāma-rūpa-vimardana-lakṣaṇo nāśo yeṣāṃ tāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:1453: mṛd-ādike sad-rūpe dravye kambu-grīvādy-avasthā-yoge ghaṭasyotpattis tad-virodhi-kapālādy-avasthā-yogas tu tasya vināśaḥ kathyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1455: evam evāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ - mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ kapālikā cūrṇa-rajas tato 'ṇuḥ [ViP 2.12.42] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1458: tad-ārambhakāni bhūtāni tu sarvadā santīti teṣu vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1459: satsu kā paridevanā kaḥ śoka-nimitta-vilāpa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1460: dehānya-nityātma-pakṣe tu vāsāṃsi ity ādikaṃ na vismartavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1461: yat tv ādy-antayor asattvān madhye 'pi bhūtāny asanty evātaḥ svāpnika-rathāśvādi-prakhyāni
GE07bhg4c02u:1462: mṛṣā-bhūtāny eva tena tad-viyoga-hetukaḥ śokaḥ pratibuddhasya na dṛṣṭa iti dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭim
GE07bhg4c02u:1464: tad evaṃ mata-dvaye 'pi deha-vināśa-hetukaḥ śoko nāstīti siddham //28//
GE07bhg4c02u:1469: śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit //29//
GE07bhg4c02u:1470: śrīdharaḥ : kutas tarhi vidvāṃso 'pi loke śocanti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:1471: ātmā-jñānād eva ity āśayenātmano durvijñeyatvam āha āścaryavad ityādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1472: kaścid enam ātmānaṃ śāstrācāryopadeśābhyāṃ paśyann āścaryavat paśyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1473: sarva-gatasya nitya-jñānānada-svabhāvasyātmanaḥ alaukikatvād aindrajālikavad ghaṭamānaṃ paśyann iva vismayena paśyati asambhāvanābhibhūtatvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1476: kaścit punaḥ viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtaḥ śrutvāpi naiva veda /
GE07bhg4c02u:1477: ca-śabdād uktvāpi na dṛṣṭvāpi na samyag vedeti draṣṭavyam //29//
GE07bhg4c02u:1479: nanu vidvāṃso 'pi bahavaḥ śocanti tat kiṃ mām eva punaḥ punar evam upālabhase /
GE07bhg4c02u:1480: anyac ca vaktur eva hi taj jāḍyaṃ śrotā yatra na budhyate iti nyāyāt tvad-vacanārthāpartipattiś
GE07bhg4c02u:1481: ca tavāpy anyeṣām iva svāśaya-doṣād iti nokta-doṣa-dvayam ity abhipretyātmano durvijñeyatām
GE07bhg4c02u:1483: enaṃ prakṛtaṃ dehinam āścaryeṇādbhutena tulyatayā vartamānam āvidyaka-nānā-vidha-viruddha-dharmavattayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1484: satanm apy asantam iva sva-prakāśa-caitanya-rūpam api jaḍam ivānanda-ghanam api duḥkhitam
GE07bhg4c02u:1485: iva nirvikāram api savikāram iva nityam anityam iva prakāśamānam apy aprakāśamānam
GE07bhg4c02u:1486: iva brahmābhinnam api tad-bhinnam iva muktam api baddham ivādvitīyam api sa-dvitīyam
GE07bhg4c02u:1491: tathā kaścid enaṃ yat paśyati tad āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:1492: / ātma-darśanam apy āścaryavad eva yat svarūpato mithyā-bhūtam api satyasya vyañjakam āvidyakam apy avidyāyā vighātakam avidyām upaghnat tat-kāryatayā svātmānam apy upahantīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1493: tathā yaḥ kaścid enaṃ paśyati sa āścaryavad iti kartṛ-viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1494: yato 'sau nivṛttāvidyātat-kāryo 'pi prārabdha-karma-prābalyāt tadvān iva vyaharati
GE07bhg4c02u:1495: sarvadā samādhi-niṣṭho 'pi vyuttiṣṭhati vyutthito 'pi punaḥ samādhim anubhavatīti
GE07bhg4c02u:1498: tad etat trayam apy āścaryam ātmā taj jñānaṃ taj-jñātā ceti parama-durvijñeyam ātmānaṃ tvaṃ katham anāyāsena jānīyā ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1499: īvam upadeṣṭur abhāvād apy ātmā durvijñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1500: yo hy ātmānaṃ jānāti sa eva tam anyasmai dhruvaṃ brūyāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1502: jānaṃs tu samāhita-cittaḥ prāyeṇa kathaṃ bravītu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1504: yathā kathaṃcij jñāto 'pi lābha-pūjā-khyāty-ādi-prayojanānapekṣatvāc ca bravīty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1505: kathaṃcit kāruṇya-mātreṇa bruvaṃs tu parameśvaravad atyanta-durlabha evety āha āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1509: na tu yaḥ paśyati tato 'nya iti vyāghātāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1510: atrāpi karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ kartari cāścaryavad iti yojyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1511: tatra karmaṇaḥ kartuś ca prāg āścaryavattvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ kriyāyās tu vyākhyāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1514: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1515: kenāpi śabdenāvācyasya śuddhasyātmano viśiṣṭa-śaktena padena jahad-ajahat-svārtha-lakṣaṇāyā
GE07bhg4c02u:1516: kalpita-sambandhena lakṣyatāvacchedakam antareṇaiva pratipādanaṃ tad api nirvikalpa-sākṣātkāra-rūpam
GE07bhg4c02u:1518: athavā vinā śaktiṃ vinā lakṣaṇāṃ vinā sambandhāntaraṃ suṣuptotthāpaka-vākya-vat tattvam asyādi-vākyena yadātmatattva-pratipādanaṃ tad āścaryavat
GE07bhg4c02u:1520: na ca vinā sambandhaṃ bodhanen 'tiprasaṅgaḥ lakṣaṇā-pakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1524: kaścid eva tātparya-viśeṣam avadhārayati na sarva iti cet /
GE07bhg4c02u:1525: hanta tarhi puruṣa-gata eva kaścid viśeṣo nirdoṣatva-rūpo niyāmakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1527: tathā ca yādṛśasya śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tātparyānusandhāna-puraḥ-saraṃ lakṣaṇayā
GE07bhg4c02u:1528: vākyārtha-bodho bhavadbhir aṅgī kriyate tādṛśasyaiva kevalaḥ śabda-viśeṣo 'khaṇḍa-sākṣātkāraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1529: vināpi sambandhena janayatīti kim anupapannam / etasmin
GE07bhg4c02u:1530: pakṣe śabda-vṛtty-aviṣayatvād yato vāco nivartanta iti sutarām upapannam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1535: hitvā nidrāṃ prabudhyante suṣupter bodhitāḥ paraiḥ //
GE07bhg4c02u:1536: jāgradvan na yataḥ śabdaṃ suṣupte vetti kaścana /
GE07bhg4c02u:1539: naśyaty avidyayā sārdhaṃ hatvā rogam ivauṣadham // [Bṛhat.Vā 1.4.860-863]
GE07bhg4c02u:1541: tad evaṃ vacana-viṣayasya vaktur vacana-kriyāyāś cātyāścarya-rūpatvād ātmano durvijñānatvam
GE07bhg4c02u:1542: uktvā śrotur durmilatvād api tad āha āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrtuvā 'py enaṃ vedeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1543: anyo draṣṭur vaktuśc a muktād vilakṣaṇo mumukṣur vaktāraṃ brahma-vidaṃ vidhivad upasṛtyainaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1545: śrutvā cainaṃ manana-nididhyāsana-paripākād vedāpi sākṣātkaroty api āścaryavat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1546: tathā cāścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam iti vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1549: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye /
GE07bhg4c02u:1550: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ // [Gītā 7.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1557: nanu yaḥ śravaṇa-mananādikaṃ karoti sa ātmānaṃ vedeti kim āścaryam ata āha - na caiva kaścid iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1559: kaścid enaṃ naiva veda śravaṇādikaṃ kurvann api /
GE07bhg4c02u:1560: tad akurvaṃs tu na vedeti kim u vaktavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1563: kutas taj-jñānam iti cet tad dhi bandha-parikṣayāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1564: asāv api ca bhūtau vā bhāvī vā vartate 'thavā // [Bṛh. Vā. Sa. 294] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1565: śravaṇādi kurvatām api pratibandha-parikṣayād eva jñānaṃ jāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1567: sa ca pratibandha-parikṣayaḥ kasyacid bhūta eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1574: jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ iti smṛteś ca durvijñeyo 'yam ātmeti nirgalito 'rthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1575: yadi tu śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścid ity eva vyākhyāyeta tadā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ [KaṭhU 1.2.7] iti śrutyaika-vākyatā na syāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1576: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ [Gītā 7.3] iti bhagavad-vacana-virodhaś ceti vidvadbhir avinayaḥ kṣantavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1577: athavā na caiva kaścid ity asya sarvatra sambandhaḥ kaścid enaṃ na paśyati na vadati
GE07bhg4c02u:1578: na śṛṇoti śrutvāpi na vedeti pañca prakārā uktāḥ kaścit paśyaty eva na vadati kaścit
GE07bhg4c02u:1579: paśyati na vadati ca kaścit tad-vacanaṃ śṛṇoti ca tad-arthaṃ jānāti ca kaścic chrutvāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:1580: na jānāti na kaścit tu sarva-bahirbhūta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1581: avidvat-pakṣe tu asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhibhūtatvād āścarya-tulyatvaṃ darśana-vadana-śravaṇeṣv iti nigada-vyākhyātaḥ ślokaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1586: yad eva prabodhyamānasyāpy aviveko nāpayātīti tatra satyam evem eva ity āha āścaryavad iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1587: enam ātmānaṃ dehaṃ ca tad-ubhaya-rūpaṃ sarva-lokam //29//
GE07bhg4c02u:1588: baladevaḥ : nanu sarvajñena tvayā bahūpadiśyamāno 'py ahaṃ śoka-nivārakam ātma-yāthātmyaṃ na budhye kim etad iti cet tatrāha āścaryavad iti
GE07bhg4c02u:1591: aspṛṣṭam evam ādi bahu-viruddha-dharmatayāścaryavad adbhuta-sādṛśyena sthitam enaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1592: mad-upadiṣṭaṃ jīvaṃ kaścid eva svadharmānuṣṭhānena satya-tapo-japādinā ca vimṛṣṭa-hṛd-guru-prasāda-labdha-tādṛśa-jñānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1594: āścaryavad iti kriyā-viśeṣaṇaṃ vā kartṛ-viśeṣaṇaṃ veti vyākhyātāraḥ kaścid enam yat paśyati tad āścaryavat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1595: yaḥ kaścit paśyati so 'py āścaryavad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1606: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata /
GE07bhg4c02u:1607: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1608: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam avadhyatvam ātmanaḥ saṅkṣepenopadiśan aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīty ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1612: sarvasya prāṇi-jātasya dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī liṅga-dehopādhir ātmā vadhyo
GE07bhg4c02u:1613: na bhavatīti nityaṃ niyataṃ yasmāt tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthūlāni sūkṣmāṇi ca bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāny
GE07bhg4c02u:1616: liṅga-dehasyāśocyatvam ātmavad evāvadhyatvād iti na sthūla-dehasya liṅga-dehasyātmano vā śocyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1618: tarhi niścitya brūhi kim ahaṃ kuryāṃ kiṃ vā na kuryām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1619: tatra śokaṃ mā kuru yuddhaṃ tu kurv ity āha dehīti dvābhyām //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1620: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ duradhigamaṃ jīva-yāthātmyaṃ samāsenopadiśann aśocyatvam upasaṃharati dehīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1621: sarvasya jīva-gaṇasya dehe hanyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī jīvo nityam avadhyo yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhīṣmādi-bhāvāpannāni śocituṃ nārhasi
GE07bhg4c02u:1622: ātmanāṃ nityatvād aśocyatvaṃ tad-dehānāṃ tv avaśya-vināśatvāt tattvam ity arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c02u:1624: sva-dharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1625: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1626: śrīdharaḥ : yac coktam arjunena vepathuś ca śarīre me ity ādi tad apy ayuktam ity āha svadharmam apīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1627: ātmano nāśābhāvād eva etesāṃ hanane 'pi vikampituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1628: kiṃ ca svadharmam apy avekṣya vikampitum nārhasi iti sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1629: yac coktaṃ - na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhava iti tatrāha dharmyād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1636: karuṇādi-doṣa-nibandhanam asādhāraṇaṃ bhramaṃ nirākartuṃ hiṃsādimattve 'pi yuddhasya
GE07bhg4c02u:1638: na kevalaṃ paramārtha-tattvam evāvekṣya kiṃ tu svadharmam api kṣatriya-dharmam api
GE07bhg4c02u:1639: yuddhāparāṅmukhatva-rūpam avekṣya śāstrataḥ paryālocya vikampituṃ vicalituṃ dharmād
GE07bhg4c02u:1641: tatraivaṃ sati yadyapy ete na paśyanti ity ādinā narake niyataṃ vāso bhavati ity
GE07bhg4c02u:1642: antena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṅkhye ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c02u:1643: ca guru-vadha-brahma-vadhādy-akaraṇaṃ yad abhihitaṃ tat sarvaṃ dharma-śāstra-paryālocanād evoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1644: kasmāt ? hi yasmād dharmyād aparāṅmukhatva-dharmād anapetād yuddhād anyat kṣatriyasya śreyaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1645: yuddham eva hi pṛthivī-jaya-dvāreṇa prajā-rakṣaṇa-brāhmaṇa-śuśrūṣādi-kṣātra-dharma-nirvāhakam iti tad eva kṣatriyasya praśastataram ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1647: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan /
GE07bhg4c02u:1651: samottamādhamai rājā tv āhūtaḥ pālayan prajāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1652: na nivarteta saṃgrāmāt kṣātraṃ dharmam anusmaran //
GE07bhg4c02u:1654: śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājñāṃ śreyaskaraṃ param //
GE07bhg4c02u:1657: tena bhūmi-pālasyaivāyaṃ dharma iti na bhramitavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1658: udāhṛta-vacane 'pi kṣatriyo hīti kṣāttraṃ dharmam iti ca spaṣṭaṃ liṅgam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1659: tasmāt kṣatriyasya yuddhaṃ praśasto dharma iti sādhu bhagavato 'bhihitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1660: apaśavo 'nye go-aśvebhyaḥ paśavo go-aśvāḥ itivat praśaṃsā-lakṣaṇayā yuddhād anyac-chreyaḥ-sādhanaṃ na vidyata ity uktam iti na doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1661: etena yuddhāt praśastataraṃ kiṃcid anuṣṭhātuṃ tato nivṛttir uciteti nirastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1662: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave ity etad api //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1664: ātmano nāśābhāvād eva vadhād vikampituṃ bhetuṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1665: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasīti sambandhaḥ //31//
GE07bhg4c02u:1666: baladevaḥ : evaṃ paramātma-jñānopayogitvād ādau jīvātma-jñānaṃ sarvān prati taulyenopadiśya
GE07bhg4c02u:1667: sa-niṣṭhān prati niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi hṛd-viśuddhi-sahakṛtām ātma-jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1668: niṣpādayantīti vadiṣyan tasyāṃ pratītim utpādayituṃ sakāmatayānuṣṭhitānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1670: yuddhaṃ khalu kṣatriyasya nityatam agnihotrādivad vihitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1671: tac ca śatru-prāṇa-vihaṃsana-rūpam agniṣṭomādi-paśu-hiṃsanavan na pratyavāya-nimittam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1673: hīnayor deha-lokayos tyāgena divyayos tayor lobhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1676: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ // [Manu 7.90]
GE07bhg4c02u:1677: yajñeṣu paśavo brahman hanyante satataṃ dvijaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1678: saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te 'pi svargam avāpnuvan // [?] ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1679: evaṃ nija-dharmam avekṣya vikampituṃ dharmāt pracalituṃ nārhasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1680: yuktaṃ na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ādinā narake nityataṃ vāso bhavatīyt antyena yuddhasya pāpa-hetutvaṃ tvayoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1681: tac cājñānād evety āha dharmyād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1684: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣan śastra-pāṇiḥ pradaṇḍayan /
GE07bhg4c02u:1689: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1690: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca mahati śreyasi svayam evopāgate sati kuto vikampasa iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1692: yadṛcchayā aprārthitam eva upapannaṃ prāptam īdṛśaṃ yuddham labhante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1694: yad vā ya evaṃvidhaṃ yuddhaṃ labhante ta eva sukhina ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1695: etena svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava iti yad uktaṃ tan nirastaṃ bhavati //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1697: nanu yuddhasya kartavyatve 'pi na bhīṣma-droṇādibhir gurubhiḥ saha tat kartum ucitam atigarhitatvād ity āśaṅkyāha yadṛcchayeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1701: yuddhaṃ ye kṣatriyāḥ pratiyogitvena labhante te sukhinaḥ sukha-bhāja eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1702: jaye satyenāyāsenaiva yaśaso rājyasya ca lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1703: parājaye cātiśīghram eva svargasya lābhād ity āha svarga-dvāram apāvṛtam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1704: apratibaddhaṃ svarga-sādhanaṃ yuddham avyavadhānenaiva svarga-janakaṃ jyotiṣṭhomādikaṃ tu ciratareṇa deha-pātasya pratibandhābhāvasya cāpekṣaṇād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1705: svarga-dvāram ity anena śyenādivat pratyavāya-śaṅkā parihṛtā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1707: duṣṭāḥ / tat-phalasya śatru-vadhasya na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni,
GE07bhg4c02u:1708: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddhasya pratyavāya-janakatvāt phale vidhy-abhāvāc ca na vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyāvatāraḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1709: yuddhasya hi phalaṃ svargaḥ sa ca na niṣiddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1712: yudhyamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā svargaṃ yānty aparāṅmukhāḥ // [Manu 7.90] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1713: yuddhaṃ tu agnīṣomīyādy-ālambha-vadha-vihitatvān na niṣedhena spraṣṭuṃ śakyate ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇādivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:1714: grahaṇāgrahayos tulya-balatayā vikalpavat sāmānya-śāstrasya viśeṣa-śāstreṇa saṅkoca-sambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1715: tathā ca vidhi-spṛṣṭe niṣedhānavakāśaḥ iti nyāyād yuddhaṃ na pratyavāya-janakaṃ nāpi bhīṣma-droṇādi-guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimitto doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1718: guruṃ vā bāla-vṛddhau vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā bahu-śrutam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1721: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet //
GE07bhg4c02u:1722: nātatāyi-vadho doṣo hantur bhavati kaścana // [Manu 8.350-351] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1724: smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1725: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c02u:1728: brāhmaṇaṃ na hanyāt iti hi dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvād dharma-śāstraṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1729: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet iti ca sva-jīvanārthatvād artha-śāstram /
GE07bhg4c02u:1730: atrocyate brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta itivad yuddha-vidhāyakam api dharma-śāstram eva sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra dṛṣṭa-prayojanānapekṣatvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1733: vidhānān mitra-labdhyādy-artha-śāstrānusāreṇa catuṣpād vyavahāre śatror api jaye
GE07bhg4c02u:1734: dharma-śāstrātikramo na kartavya ity etat paraṃ vacanam etad ity āha /
GE07bhg4c02u:1736: tad evaṃ yuddha-karaṇe sukhokteḥ svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava ity arjunoktam apākṛtam //32//
GE07bhg4c02u:1738: jetṛbhyaḥ sakāśād api nyāya-yuddhe mṛtānām adhikaṃ sukham ato bhīṣmādīn hatvā tān pratyuta svato 'pi adhika-sukhinaḥ kuru ity āha yadṛcchayeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1741: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cāyatnād āgate 'smin mahati śreyasi na yuktas te kampa ity āha yadṛcchayeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1743: yatnaṃ vinaiva copapannam īdṛśaṃ bhīṣmādibhir mahā-vīraiḥ saha yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ sabhāgyāḥ kṣatriyā labhante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1744: vijaye satya-śrameṇa kīrti-rājyayor mṛtyau sati śīghram eva svargasya ca prāpter ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1745: etad vyañjayan viśinaṣṭi - svarga-dvāram upāvṛtam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1749: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1750: tataḥ sva-dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1751: śrīdharaḥ : viparyaye doṣam āha atha ced iti //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1755: api trailokya-rājyasya ity uktatvāt tat kathaṃ mayā kartavyam ity āśaṅkyākaraṇe doṣam āha atha ced iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1757: imaṃ bhīṣma-droṇādi-vīra-puruṣa-pratiyogikaṃ dharmyaṃ hiṃsādi-doṣaṇāduṣṭaṃ satāṃ dharmād anapetām iti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1759: na kūṭair āyudhair hanyād yudhyamāno raṇe ripūn /
GE07bhg4c02u:1761: na ca hanyāt sthalārūḍhaṃ na klībaṃ na kṛtāñjalim /
GE07bhg4c02u:1762: na mukta-keśaṃ nāsīnaṃ na tavāsmīti vādinam //
GE07bhg4c02u:1763: na suptaṃ na visaṃnāhaṃ na nagnaṃ na nirāyudham /
GE07bhg4c02u:1766: na bhītaṃ na parāvṛttaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // [Manu 7.91-94] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1767: satāṃ dharmam ullaṅghya yudhyamāno hi pāpīyān syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1768: tvaṃ tu parair āhūto 'pi sad-dharmopetam api saṅgrāmaṃ yuddhaṃ na kariṣyasi dharmato
GE07bhg4c02u:1769: lokato vā bhītaḥ parāvṛtto bhaviṣyasi cet tato nirjitya para-sainyāni kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:1771: hitvānanuṣṭhāya kīrtiṃ ca mahādevādi-samāgama-nimittāṃ hitvā na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1772: ity ādi-śāstra-niṣiddha-saṅgrāma-nivṛttyā ca raṇa-janyaṃ pāpam eva kevalam avāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c02u:1773: na tu dharmaṃ kīrtiṃ cety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1774: athavā 'neka-janmārjitaṃ dharmaṃ tyaktvā rāja-kṛtaṃ pāpam evāvāpsyasīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1775: yasmāt tvāṃ parāvṛttam ete duṣṭā avaśyaṃ haniṣyanti ataḥ parāvṛtta-hataḥ saṃś ciropārjita-nija-sukṛta-parityāgena paropārjita-duṣkṛta-mātra-bhāṅ mā bhūr ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1777: yas tu bhītaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṅgrāme hanyate paraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1778: bhartur yad duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ pratipadyate //
GE07bhg4c02u:1779: yac cāsya sukṛtaṃ kiṃcid amutrārtham upārjitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1780: bhartā tat sarvam ādatte parāvṛtta-hatasya tu // [Manu 7.95-96] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1781: yājñavalkyo 'pi rājā sukṛtam ādatte hatānāṃ vipalāyinām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1782: tena yad uktam - pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ [Gītā 1.36],
GE07bhg4c02u:1783: etān na hantum icchāmi ghanto 'pi madhusūdana [Gītā 1.35] iti tan nirākṛtaṃ bhavati //33//
GE07bhg4c02u:1786: baladevaḥ : vipakṣe doṣān darśayati athety ādibhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1787: svasya tava dharmyaṃ yuddha-lakṣaṇaṃ kīrtiṃ ca rudra-santoṣaṇa-nivāta-kavacādi-vadha-labdhāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1788: hitvā pāpaṃ na nivarteta saṅgrāmād ity ādi smṛti-pratiṣiddhaṃ sva-dharma-tyāga-lakṣaṇaṃ prāpsyasi //33 //
GE07bhg4c02u:1792: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca akīrtim ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1797: evaṃ kīrti-dharmayor iṣṭayor aprāptir aniṣṭasya ca pāpasya prāptir yuddha-parityāge darśitā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1798: tatra pāpākhyam aniṣṭaṃ vyavadhānena duḥkha-phaladam āmutrikatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1799: śiṣṭa-garhā-lakṣaṇaṃ tv aniṣṭam āsanna-phaladam atyasahyam ity āha akīrtim iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1800: bhūtāni devarṣi-manuṣyādīni te tavāvyayāṃ dīrgha-kālam akīrtiṃ na dharmātmāyaṃ na śūro 'yam ity evaṃ-rūpāṃ kathayiṣyanty anyonyaṃ kathā-prasaṅge
GE07bhg4c02u:1802: na kevalaṃ kīrti-dharmau hitvā pāpaṃ prāpsyasi api tu akīrtiṃ ca prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1803: na kevalaṃ tvam eva tāṃ prāpsyasi api tu bhūtāny api kathayiṣyantīti vā nipātayor arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1804: nanu yuddhe sva-maraṇa-sandehāt tat-parihārārtham akīrtir api soḍhavyā ātma-rakṣaṇasyātyantāpekṣitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1806: sāmnā dānena bhedena samastair atha vā pṛthak /
GE07bhg4c02u:1807: vijetuṃ prayatetārīn na yuddhena kadā cana //
GE07bhg4c02u:1809: parājayaś ca saṃgrāme tasmād yuddhaṃ vivarjayet //
GE07bhg4c02u:1811: tathā yudhyeta saṃpanno vijayeta ripūn yathā // [ManuS 7.198-200]
GE07bhg4c02u:1813: tathā ca maraṇa-bhītasya kim akīrti-duḥkham iti śaṅkām apanudati sambhāvitasya dharmātmā
GE07bhg4c02u:1814: śūra ity evam ādibhir ananya-labhyair guṇair bahumatasya janasyākīrtir maraṇād apy
GE07bhg4c02u:1817: evaṃ yasmād ato 'kīrter maraṇam eva varaṃ nyūnatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1820: udāhṛta-vacanaṃ tv artha-śāstratvāt na nivarteta saṅgrāmāt [Manu 7.88] ity ādi-dharma-śāstrād durbalam iti bhāvaḥ //34//
GE07bhg4c02u:1824: baladevaḥ : na kevalaṃ svadharmasya kīrteś ca kṣati-mātram /
GE07bhg4c02u:1825: yuddhe samārabdhe 'rjunaḥ palāyata ity avyayāṃ śāśvatīm akīrtiṃ ca tava bhūtāni sarve lokāḥ kathayiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1826: nanu maraṇād bhītena mayā akīrtiḥ soḍhavyeti cet tatrāha sambhāvitasyātipratiṣṭhitasya /
GE07bhg4c02u:1828: tathā ca tādṛśākīṛter maraṇam eva varam iti //34//
GE07bhg4c02u:1829: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1830: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1832: yeṣāṃ bahu-guṇatvena tvaṃ pūrvaṃ sammato 'bhūs ta eva bhayāt saṃgrāmān nivṛttaṃ tvāṃ manyeran /
GE07bhg4c02u:1833: tataś ca pūrvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā lāghavam laghutāṃ yāsyasi //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1836: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahu-mato 'smac-chatrur arjunas tu mahāśūra iti bahu-saṃmāna-viṣayo bhūtvā
GE07bhg4c02u:1837: samprati yuddhād uparame sati lāghavaṃ yāsyasi te duryodhanādayo mahārathās tvāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1838: bhayād eva raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyanta ity anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1839: kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi bhayaṃ vinā yuddhoparati-hetur bandhu-snehādiko nopapadyata iti matveti bhāvaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1840: baladevaḥ : nanu kula-kṣaya-doṣāt kāruṇyāc ca vinivṛttasya mama katham akīrtiḥ syād iti cet tatrāha bhayād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1841: mahārathā duryodhanādayas tvāṃ karṇādi-bhayān na tu bandhu-kāruṇyād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:1842: na hi śūrasya śatru-bhayaṃ vinā bandhu-snehena yuddhād uparatir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1843: itaḥ pūrvaṃ yeṣāṃ tvaṃ bahumataḥ śūro vairīti bahu-guṇavattayā saṃmato 'bhūr idānīṃ yuddhe samupasthite kātaro 'yaṃ vinivṛtta ity evaṃ tat-kṛtaṃ lāghavaṃ duḥsahaṃ yāsyasi //35//
GE07bhg4c02u:1846: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim //36//
GE07bhg4c02u:1848: avācyān vādān vacanānarhān śabdān tava ahitāḥ tvac-chatravo vadiṣyanti //36//
GE07bhg4c02u:1850: nanu bhīṣmādayo mahārathā na bahu manyantāṃ duryodhanādayas tu śatravo bahu maṃsyante māṃ yuddha-nivṛttyā tad-upakāritvād ity ata āha avācyeti
GE07bhg4c02u:1851: tavāsādhāraṇaṃ yat sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ tan nindantas tava śatravo duryodhanādayo
GE07bhg4c02u:1852: 'vācyān vādān vacanān arhān ṣaṇḍha-tilādi-rūpān eva śabdān bahūn aneka-prakārān vadiṣyanti
GE07bhg4c02u:1853: na tu bahu maṃsyanta ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1854: athavā tava sāmarthyaṃ stuti-yogyatvaṃ tava nindanto 'hitā avācya-vādān vadiṣyantīty anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1855: nanu bhīṣma-droṇādi-vadha-prayuktaṃ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham asahamāno yuddhān nivṛttaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1856: śatru-kṛta-sāmarthya-nindanādi-duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ śakṣyāmīty ata āha tatas tasmān nindā-prāpti-duḥkhāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1857: kiṃ tu duḥkhataraṃ tato 'dhikaṃ kim api duḥkhaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ //36 //
GE07bhg4c02u:1862: ahitāḥ śatravo dhārtarāṣṭrās tava sāmarthyaṃ pūrva-siddhaṃ parākramaṃ nindantaḥ bahūn avācya-vādān śaṇḍhatilādi-śabdān vadiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1863: tata evaṃvidhāvācya-vāda-śravaṇād atiśāyitaṃ kiṃ duḥkham asti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1864: itthaṃ caite ṣaḍbhir yuddha-vairāgyasyāsvargatvam akīrti-karatvaṃ coktaṃ darśitam //36//
GE07bhg4c02u:1866: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm /
GE07bhg4c02u:1868: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktaṃ na caitad vidmaḥ [Gītā 2.6] iti tatrāha hato vety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1871: nanu tarhi yuddhe gurv-ādi-vadha-vaśān madhyastha-kṛtā nindā tato nivṛttau tu śatru-kṛtā
GE07bhg4c02u:1872: nindety ubhayataḥ pāśā rajjur ity āśaṅkya jaye parājaye ca lābha-dhrauvyād yuddhārtham
GE07bhg4c02u:1873: evotthānam āvaśyakam ity āha hato veti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1875: yasmād ubhayathāpi te lābhas tasmāj jeṣyāmi śatrūn mariṣyāmi veti kṛta-niścayaḥ san yuddhāyottiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:1877: etena na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyaḥ [Gītā 2.6] ity ādi parihṛtam //37//
GE07bhg4c02u:1879: nanu yuddhe mama jaya eva bhāvīty api nāsti niścayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1880: tataś ca kathaṃ yuddhe pravartitavyam ity ata āha hata iti //37//
GE07bhg4c02u:1881: baladevaḥ : nanu yuddhe vijaya eva me syād iti niścayābhāvāt tato 'haṃ nivṛtto 'smīti cet tatrāha hato veti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1885: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1886: śrīdharaḥ : yad apy uktaṃ pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] iti tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1889: tayor api kāraṇa-bhūtāu jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1892: sukhādy-abhilāsaṃ hitvā svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamānaḥ pāpaṃ na prāpsyasīty arthaḥ //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1894: nanv evaṃ svargam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tasya nityatva-vyāghātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1895: rājyam uddiśya yuddha-karaṇe tv artha-śāstratvād dharma-śāstrāpekṣayā daurbalyaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1896: tataś ca kāmyasyākaraṇe kutaḥ pāpaṃ dṛṣṭārthasya guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadhasya kuto dharmatvaṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:1897: tathā cātha ced iti ślokārtho vyāhata iti cet tatrāha sukha-duḥkhe iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1899: sukhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe lābhe tat-kāraṇe jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c02u:1900: evaṃ duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetāv ajaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tato yuddhāya yujyasva sannadhau bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:1901: evaṃ sukha-kāmanāṃ duḥkha-nivṛtti-kāmanāṃ vā vihāya svadharma-buddhyā yudhyamāno guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittaṃ ca pāpaṃ na prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1902: yas tu phala-kāmanayā karoti sa guru-brāhmaṇādi-vadha-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ prāpnoti yo vā na karoti sa nitya-karmākaraṇa-nimittam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1903: ataḥ phala-kāmanām antareṇa kurvann ubhaya-vidham api pāpaṃ na prāpnotīti prāg eva vyākhyāto 'bhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1904: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm [Gītā 2.37] iti svānuṣaṅgika-phala-kathanam iti na doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1905: tathā ca āpastambaḥ smarati - tad yathāmre
GE07bhg4c02u:1906: phalārthe nimitte chāyā-gandhāvanūtpadyete evaṃ dharmaṃ caryamāṇam arthā anūtpadyante no ced anūtpadyante na dharma-hānir bhavati iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1907: ato yuddha-śāstrasyārtha-śāstratvābhāvāt pāpam evāśrayed asmān [Gītā 1.36] ity ādi nirākṛtaṃ bhavati //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1909: tasmāt tava sarvathā yuddham eva dharmas tad api yad imaṃ pāpa-kāraṇam āśaṅkase,
GE07bhg4c02u:1910: tarhi mattaḥ pāpānutpatti-prakāraṃ śikṣitvā yudhyasvety āha sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:1912: tad-dhetur jayājayāv api samau kṛtvā vivekena tulyau vibhāvety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1913: tataś caivaṃ-bhūta-sāmya-lakṣaṇe jñānavatas tava pāpaṃ naiva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c02u:1914: yad vakṣyate lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā [Gītā 5.10] iti //38//
GE07bhg4c02u:1915: baladevaḥ : nanu atha cet tvam ity ādi-padyārtho vyāhṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1916: rājyādy-uddeśena kṛtasya yuddhasya guru-viprādi-vināśa-hetutvena pāpotpādakatvād iti cen mumukṣu-vartmanā yuddhamānasya tava tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ pāpaṃ na syād ity āha sukheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1917: sāmya-karaṇam iha tatra tatra nirvikāratvaṃ bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1918: sukhe tad-dhetau jaye ca rāgam akṛtvā duḥkhe tad-dhetāv alābhe tad-dhetau parājaye ca dveṣam akṛtvā tatra tatra nirvikāra-cittaḥ san tato yuddhāya yujyasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:1920: evaṃ mumukṣu-rītyā yoddhā tvaṃ pāpaṃ tad-vināśa-hetukaṃ nāvāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1921: phalecchuḥ san yo yudhyate sa tat-pāpaṃ vindati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1922: vijñānārthī tu purātanam ananta-pāpam apanudatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1923: nanu phala-rāgaṃ vinā duṣkare yuddha-dānādau kathaṃ pravṛttir iti ced anantātmānanda-rāgaṃ tatra pravartakaṃ gṛhāṇa rājyādy-anurāgam iva bhṛgu-pāte
GE07bhg4c02u:1925: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1926: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1927: śrīdharaḥ : upadiṣṭaṃ jñāna-yogam upasaṃharaṃs tat-sādhanaṃ karma-yogaṃ prastauti eṣety ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:1928: samyak khyāyate prakāśyate vastu-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyā samyak jñānam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1931: evam abhihitāyām api tava ced ātma-tattvam aparokṣaṃ na bhavati tarhy antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvārā ātma-tattvāparokṣārthaṃ karma-yoga tv imāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1932: yayā buddhyā yuktaḥ parameśvarārpita-karma-yogena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ san tat-prasāda-labdhāparokṣa-jñānena karmātmakaṃ bandhaṃ prakarṣeṇa hāsyasi tyakṣyasi //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1935: tathāpi na māṃ prati yuddha-kartavyatopadeśas tavocitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1936: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ [Gītā 2.19] ity ādinā kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam [Gītā 2.21] ity antena viduṣaḥ sarva-karma-pratikṣepāt
GE07bhg4c02u:1937: na hy akartr-bhoktṛ-śuddha-svarūpo 'ham asmi yuddhaṃ kṛtvā tat-phalaṃ bhokṣya iti ca jñānaṃ sambhavati virodhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1939: ayaṃ cārjunābhiprāyo jyāyasī ced ity atra vyakto bhaviṣyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1940: tasmād ekam eva māṃ prati jñānasya karmaṇaś copadeśo nopapadyata iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c02u:1941: vidvad-avidvad-avasthā-bhedena jñāna-karmopadeśopapatter ity āha bhagavān eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1942: eṣā na tv evāham ity ādy-eka-viṃśati-ślokais te tubhyam abhihitā sāṅkhye samyak khyāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:1943: sarvopādhi-śūnyatayā pratipādyate paramātma-tattvam anayeti saṅkhyopaniṣat tayaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:1944: tāparya-parisamāptyā pratipādyate yaḥ sa sāṅkhya aupaniṣadaḥ puruṣa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1945: tasmin buddhis tan-mātra-viṣayaṃ jñānaṃ sarvānartha-nivṛtti-kāraṇaṃ tvāṃ prati mayoktaṃ naitādṛśa-jñānavataḥ kvacid api karmocyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1946: tasya kāryaṃ na vidyata iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:1947: yadi punar evaṃ mayokte 'pi tavaiṣā buddhir nodeti citta-doṣāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:1949: tasmin yoge karma-yoge tu karaṇīyām imāṃ sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atroktāṃ phalābhisandhi-tyāga-lakṣaṇāṃ buddhiṃ vistareṇa mayā vakṣyamāṇāṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c02u:1951: tathā ca śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ prati jñānopadeśo 'śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇaṃ prati karmopadeśa iti kutaḥ samuccaya-śaṅkayā virodhāvakāśa ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:1952: yoga-viṣayāṃ buddhiṃ phala-kathanena stauti - yathā vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā karmasu
GE07bhg4c02u:1953: yuktas tvaṃ karma-nimittaṃ bandha-nāśāyāśuddhi-lakṣaṇaṃ jñāna-pratibandhaṃ prakarṣeṇa
GE07bhg4c02u:1955: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - karma-nimitto jñāna-pratibandhaḥ karmaṇaiva dharmākhyenāpanetuṃ śakyate dharmeṇa pāpam apanudati [Mahānā 13.6] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1956: śravaṇādi-lakṣaṇo vicāras tu karmātmaka-pratibandha-rahitasyāsambhāvanādi-pratibandhaṃ dṛṣṭa-dvāreṇāpanayatīti na karma-bandha-nirākaraṇāyopadeṣṭuṃ śakyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1960: tathā ca vakṣyati - karmaṇy evādhikāras te [Gītā 2.47] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1962: antaraṅga-sādhanaṃ śravaṇādi vihāya bahiraṅga-sādhanaṃ karmaiva bhagavatā kim ity arjunāyopadiśyata iti nirastam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1963: karma-bandhaṃ saṃsāram īśvara-prasāda-nimitta-jñāna-prāptyā prahāsyasīti prācāṃ vyākhyāne tv adhyāhāra-doṣaḥ karma-pada-vaiyarthyaṃ ca parihartavyam
GE07bhg4c02u:1966: samyak khyāyate prakāśyate vastu-tattvam aneneti sāṅkhyaṃ samyak jñānam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1968: adhunā yoge bhakti-yoge imāṃ vakṣyamāṇāṃ buddhiṃ karaṇīyāṃ śṛṇu,
GE07bhg4c02u:1971: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ jñāna-yogam upasaṃharan tad-upāyaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogaṃ vaktum ārabhate eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1972: saṅkhyopaniṣat samyak khyāyate nirūpyate tattvam anayā iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:1975: ne tv evāhaṃ ity ādinā tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni ity antena /
GE07bhg4c02u:1976: sā cet tava citta-tad-doṣān nābhyudeti tarhi yoge tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā
GE07bhg4c02u:1977: vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasā nāśakena ity ādi śruty-uktāntargata-jñāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge
GE07bhg4c02u:1980: karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ bhagavad-ājñayā mahā-prayāsāni karmāṇi kurvaṃs tat-tad-uddeśa-mahimnā tvad-antar-abhyuditayātma-jñāna-niṣṭhayā saṃsāraṃ tariṣyasīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1982: karma sa-kāmaṃ jñāna-phalakaṃ tu tan-niṣkāmam iti śāstre 'smin paribhāṣyate //39//
GE07bhg4c02u:1985: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt //40//
GE07bhg4c02u:1986: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kṛṣyādivat karmaṇāṃ kadācid vighna-bāhulyena phale vyabhicārāt mantrādy-aṅga-vaiguṇyena ca pratyavāya-sambhavaāt kutaḥ karma-yogena karma-bandha-prahāṇam /
GE07bhg4c02u:1988: iha niṣkāma-karma-yoge abhikramasya prārambhasya nāśo niṣphalatvaṃ nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:1991: kiṃ cāsya dharmasya īśvarārādhanārtha-karma-yogasya svalpam apy upakrama-mātram api kṛtaṃ mahato bhayāt saṃsāra-lakṣaṇāt trāyate rakṣati /
GE07bhg4c02u:1992: na tu kāmya-karmavat kiñcid aṅga-vaikguṇyādinā naiṣphalyam asyety arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c02u:1994: nanu tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena [BAU
GE07bhg4c02u:1995: 4.4.22] iti śrutyā vividiṣāṃ jñānaṃ coddiśya saṃyoga-pṛthaktva-nyāyena sarva-karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:1996: viniyogāt tatra cāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddher dvāratvān māṃ prati karmānuṣṭhānaṃ vidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:1997: tatra tad yatheha karma-jito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇya-jito lokaḥ kṣīyate
GE07bhg4c02u:1998: [Chā 8.1.6] iti śruti-bodhitasya phala-nāśasya sambhāvāj jñānaṃ vividiṣāṃ coddiśya
GE07bhg4c02u:1999: kriyamāṇasya yajñādeḥ kāmyatvāt sarvāṅgopasaṃhāreṇānuṣṭheyasya yat kiṃcid aṅgāsampattāv
GE07bhg4c02u:2000: api vaiguṇyāpatter yajñenety ādi-vākya-vihitānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām ekena puruṣāyuṣa-paryavasāne
GE07bhg4c02u:2001: 'pi kartum aśakyatvāt kutaḥ karma-bandhaṃ prahāsyasīti-phalaṃ pratyāśety ata āha bhagavān neheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2002: abhikramyate karmaṇā prārabhyate yat phalaṃ so 'bhikramas tasya nāśas tad yathehety ādinā pratipādita iha niṣkāma-karma-yoge nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2003: etat-phalasya śuddheḥ pāpa-kṣaya-rūpatvena loka-śabda-vācya-bhogyatvābhāvena ca kṣayāsambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2005: phalam ajanayitvā nāśāsambhavād iha phala-nāśo nāstīti sādhūktam / tad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c02u:2006: tad yatheheti yā nindā sā phale na tu karmaṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2007: phalecchāṃ tu parityajya kṛtaṃ karma viśuddhi-kṛt // iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2008: tathā pratyavāyo 'ṅga-vaiguṇya-nibandhanaṃ vaiguṇyam iha na vidyate tam iti vākyena nityānām evopātta-durita-kṣaya-dvāreṇa vividiṣāyāṃ viniyogāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2010: kāmyānām api saṃyoga-pṛthaktva-nyāyena viniyoga iti pakṣe 'pi phalābhisandhi-rahitatvena teṣāṃ nitya-tulyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2015: tam etam iti vākyena nityānāṃ vakṣyate vidhiḥ //
GE07bhg4c02u:2016: yad vā vividiṣārthatvaṃ kāmyānām api karmaṇām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2017: tam etam iti vākyena saṃyogasya pṛthaktvataḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2018: tathā ca phalābhisandhinā kriyamāṇa eva karmaṇi sarvāṅgopa-saṃhāra-niyamāt tad-vilakṣaṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:2019: śuddhy-arthe karmaṇi pratinidhyādinā samāpti-sambhavān nāṅga-vaiguṇya-nimittaḥ pratyavāyo 'stīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2020: tathāsya śuddhy-arthasya dharmasya tam etam ity ādi-vākya-vihitasya madhye svalpam
GE07bhg4c02u:2021: api saṅkhyayetikartavyatayā vā yathā-śakti-bhagavad-ārādhanārthaṃ kiṃcid apy anuṣṭhitaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2022: san mahataḥ saṃsāra-bhayāt trāyate bhagavat-prasāda-sampādanenānuṣṭhātāraṃ rakṣati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2026: tam etam iti vākye samuccaya-vidhāyakābhāvāc cāśuddhi-tāratamyād evānuṣṭhāna-tāratamyopapatter yuktam uktaṃ karma-bandhaṃ prahāsyasi //40//
GE07bhg4c02u:2030: tatra karmaṇy evādhikāraḥ ity ataḥ prāg bhakti-yoga eva nirūpyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2031: nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna ity ukter bhakter eve triguṇātītatvāt tayaiva puruṣo nistraiguṇyo bhavatīty ekādaśa-skandhe[*ENDNOTE] prasiddheḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2032: jñāna-karmaṇos tu sāttvikatva-rājasatvābhyāṃ nistraiguṇyatvānupapatter bhagavad-arpita-lakṣaṇā bhaktis tu karmaṇo vaiphalyābhāva-mātraṃ pratipādayati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2033: na tu svasya bhakti-vyapadeśaṃ prādhānyābhāvād eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2034: yadi ca bhagavad-arpitaṃ karmāpi bhaktir eveti mataṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2041: na cārpitaṃ karma yad apy akāraṇam // [BhP 1.5.12]
GE07bhg4c02u:2045: ubhāv apy etau buddhi-yoga-śabda-vācyau jñeyau - dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te [10.10],
GE07bhg4c02u:2046: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanañjaya [2.49] iti cokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2048: iha bhakti-yoge 'bhikrame ārambha-mātre kṛte 'py asya bhaktiyogasya nāśo nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2050: yathā karma-yoge ārambhaṃ kṛtvā karmānuṣṭhitavataḥ karma-nāśa-pratyavāyau syātām iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2051: nanu tarhi tasya bhakty-anuṣṭhātu-kāmasya samucita-bhakty-akaraṇāt bhakti-phalaṃ tu naiva syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2053: asya dharmasya svalpam apy ārambha-samaye yā kiñcin-mātrī bhaktir abhūt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2056: yan-nāma sakṛc-chravaṇāt pukkaśo 'pi vimucyate saṃsārād ity [BhP 6.16.44] ādi-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2062: iti bhagavato vākyena sahāsya-vākyasyaikārtham eva dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2063: kintu tatra nirguṇatvān na hi guṇātītaṃ vastu kadācid dhvastaṃ bhavatīti hetur upanyastaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2065: na ca niṣkāma-karmaṇo 'pi bhagavad-arpaṇa-mahimnā nirguṇatvam eveti vācyam - mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma tat [BhP 11.25.23]
GE07bhg4c02u:2066: baladevaḥ : vakṣyamāṇayā buddhyā yuktaṃ karma-yogaṃ stauti neheti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2067: iha tam etam ity ādi vākyokteḥ niṣkāma-karma-yoge 'bhikramasyārambhasya phalotpādakatva-nāśo nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2070: ātmoddeśa-mahimnā oṃ tat sat iti bhagavan-nāmnā ca tasya vināśāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2071: iha bhagavad-arpitasya niṣāma-karma-lakṣaṇa-dharmasya kiñcid apy anuṣṭhitaṃ san mahato bhayāt saṃsārāt trāyate anuṣṭhātāraṃ rakṣati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2072: vakṣyati caivaṃ pārtha naiveha nāmutra [Gītā 6.40] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2075: niṣkāma-karmāṇi tu yathā-śakty-anuṣṭhitāni jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ janayanty evokta-hetutaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2080: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyām ubhayor vaiṣamyam āha vyavasāyātmiketi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2081: iha īśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇe karma-yoge vyavasāyātmikā parameśvara-bhaktyaiva dhruvaṃ tariṣyāmīti niścayātmikā ekaiva ekaniṣṭhaiva buddhir bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:2082: avyavasāyināṃ tu īśvarārādhana-bahirmukhānāṃ kāmināṃ kāmānām ānantyāt anantāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2083: tatrāpi hi karma-phala-guṇa-phalatvādi-prakāra-bhedād bahu-śākhāś ca buddhayo bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2084: īśvarārādhanārthaṃ hi nityaṃ naimittikaṃ ca karma kiñcid aṅga-vaiguṇye 'pi na naśyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2085: yathā śaknuyāt tathā kuryād iti hi tad vidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2091: etad-upapādanāya tam etam iti vākya-vihitānām ekārthatvam āha vyavasāyātmiketi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2092: he kurunandaneha śreyo-mārge tam etam iti vākye vā vyavasāyātmikātma-tattva-niścayātmikā
GE07bhg4c02u:2093: buddhir ekaiva caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ sādhyā vivakṣitā vedānuvacanena ity ādau tṛtīyā-vibhaktyā
GE07bhg4c02u:2096: ekārthatve 'pi darśa-pūrṇamāsābhyām itivad dvandva-samāsena yad agnaye ca prajāpataye cetivac ca-śabdena na tathātra kiṃcit pramāṇam astīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2097: sāṅkhya-viṣayā yoga-viṣayā ca buddhir eka-phalatvād ekā vyavasāyātmikā sarva-viparīta-buddhīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2098: bādhikā nirdoṣa-veda-vākya-samutthatvād itarās tv avyavasāyināṃ buddhayo bādhyā ity
GE07bhg4c02u:2101: niścayātmikaika-niṣṭhaiva buddhir iha karma-yoge bhavatīty artham āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2102: sarvathāpi tu jñāna-kāṇḍānusāreṇa svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt ity upapannam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2103: karma-kāṇḍe punar bahu-śākhā aneka-bhedāḥ kāmānām aneka-bhedatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2109: kiṃ ca sarvābhyo 'pi buddhibhyo bhakti-yoga-viṣayiṇy eva buddhir uktṛṣṭety āha vyavasāyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2112: mama sādhanam etad eva mama sādhyam etad eva mama jīvātuḥ sādhana-sādhya-daśayos
GE07bhg4c02u:2113: tyaktum aśakyam etad eva me kāmyam etad eva me kāryam etad anyan na me kāryaṃ nāpy
GE07bhg4c02u:2114: abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ svapne 'pīty atra sukham astu duḥkhaṃ vāstu saṃsāro naśyatu vā na naśyatu /
GE07bhg4c02u:2115: tatra mama kāpi na kṣatir ity evaṃ niścayātmikā buddhir akaitava-bhaktāv eva sambhavet /
GE07bhg4c02u:2116: tad uktaṃ - tato bhajeta māṃ bhaktyā śraddhālur dṛḍha-niścayaḥ [BhP 11.20.28] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2117: tato 'nyatra naiva buddhir ekety āha bahv iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2119: tathā hi karma-yoge kāmānām ānantyād buddhayo 'nantāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2120: tathaiva jñāna-yoge prathamam antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhy-arthaṃ niṣkāma-karmaṇi buddhis tatas tasmin śuddhe sati karma-saṃnyāse buddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2122: jñāna-vaiphalyābhāvārthaṃ bhaktau buddhiḥ jñānaṃ ca mayi saṃnyaset iti bhagavad-ukter jñāna-saṃnyāse ca bhaktau buddhir iti buddhayo 'nantāḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2124: baladevaḥ : kāmya-karma-viṣayaka-buddhito niṣkāma-karma-viṣayaka-buddher vaiśiṣṭyam āha vyavasāyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2125: he kurunandana iha vaidikeṣu sarveṣu karmasu vyavasāyātmikā bhagavad-arcana-rūpair
GE07bhg4c02u:2127: aham anubhaviṣyāmīti niścaya-rūpā buddhir ekā ekav-viṣayatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2128: ekasmai tad-anubhavāya teṣāṃ vihitatvād iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2129: avyavasāyinām kāmya-karmānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ tu buddhayo hy anantāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2133: atra hi dehātiriktātma-jñāna-mātram apekṣate na tūktātma-yāthātmyaṃ tan niścaye kāmya-karmasu pravṛtter asambhavāt //41//
GE07bhg4c02u:2135: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2141: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kāmino 'pi kaṣṭān kāmān vihāya vyavasāyātmikām eva buddhiṃ kim iti na kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2143: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ viṣa-latāvad āpāta-ramaṇīyāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ paramārtha-phala-parām eva vadanti vācaṃ svargādi-phala-śrutim /
GE07bhg4c02u:2144: teṣāṃ tayā vācā 'pahṛta-cetasāṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2149: akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsya-yājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2150: tathā, apāṃ somam amṛtā ambhūma ity ādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2155: ataḥ svarga eva paraḥ puruṣārtho yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c02u:2156: janma ca tatra karmāṇi ca tat-phalāni ca pradadātīti tathā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2157: tāṃ bhogaiśvaryayor gatiṃ prāptiṃ prati sādhana-bhūtā ye kriyā-viśeṣās te bahulā yasyāṃ tāṃ pravadantīty anuṣaṅgaḥ //43//
GE07bhg4c02u:2159: bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānām abhiniviṣṭānāṃ tayā puṣpitayā vācāpahṛtam ākṛṣṭaṃ ceto yeṣām teṣām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2162: tasmin niścayātmikā buddhis tu na vidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2166: avyavasayinām api vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ kuto na bhavati pramāṇasya tulyatvād ity āśaṅkya pratibandhaka-sad-bhāvān na bhavatīty āha yām imām iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2167: kuta evam ata āha bhogaiśvarya-gatiṃ prati kriyā-viśeṣa-bahulām amṛta-pānorvaśī-vihāra-pārijāta-parimalādi-nibandhano
GE07bhg4c02u:2168: yo bhogas tat-kāraṇaṃ ca yad aiśvaryaṃ devādi-svāmitvaṃ tayor gatiṃ prāptiṃ prati
GE07bhg4c02u:2169: sādhana-bhūtā ye kriyā-viśeṣā agnihotra-darśa-pūrṇamāsa-jyotiṣṭomādayas tair bahulāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2172: etādṛśīṃ karma-kāṇḍa-lakṣaṇāṃ vācaṃ pravadanti prakṛṣṭāṃ paramārtha-svargādi-phalām abhyupagacchanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2174: ataeva veda-vāda-ratā vede ye santi vādā artha-vādāḥ akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsya-yājinaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2175: sukṛtaṃ bhavati ity evam ādayas teṣv eva ratā vedārtha-satyatvenaivam evaitad iti
GE07bhg4c02u:2178: ataeva nānyad astīti-vādinaḥ karma-kāṇḍāpekṣayā nāsty anyaj jñāna-kāṇḍaṃ sarvasyāpi vedasya kārya-paratvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2179: karma-phalāpekṣayā ca nāsty anyan niratiśayaṃ jñāna-phalam iti vadana-śīlā mahatā prabandhena jñāna-kāṇḍa-viruddhārtha-bhāṣiṇa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2182: evaṃ sati mokṣam api kuto na kāmayante ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2183: yataḥ svarga-parāḥ svarga evorvaśy-ādy-apetatvena para utkṛṣṭo yeṣāṃ te tathā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2185: puruṣārtho nāstīti bhrāmyanto viveka-vairāgyābhāvān mokṣa-kathām api soḍhum akṣamā iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2186: teṣāṃ ca pūrvokta-bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānāṃ kṣayitvādi-doṣādarśanena niviṣṭāntaḥ-karaṇānāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2187: tayā kriyā-viśeṣa-bhulayā vācāpahṛtam ācchāditaṃ ceto viveka-jñānaṃ yeṣāṃ tathā-bhūtānām
GE07bhg4c02u:2188: artha-vādāḥ stuty-arthās tātparya-viṣaye pramāṇāntarābādhite vedasya prāmāṇyam iti
GE07bhg4c02u:2189: suprasiddham api jñātum aśaktānāṃ samādhāv antaḥ-karaṇe vayavasāyātmikā buddhir na
GE07bhg4c02u:2191: samādhi-viṣayā vyavasāyātmikā buddhis teṣāṃ na bhavatīti vā adhikaraṇe viṣaye vā sapatamyās tulyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2193: samādhīyate 'smin sarvam iti vyutpattyā samādhir antaḥ-karaṇaṃ vā paramātmā veti nāprasiddhārtha-kalpanam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2194: ahaṃ brahmety avasthānaṃ samādhis tan-nimittaṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhir noptadyata iti vyākhyāne tu
GE07bhg4c02u:2196: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ -- yadyapi kāmyāny agnihotrādīni śuddhy-arthebhyo na viśiṣyante tathāpi phalābhisandhi-doṣān nāśaya-śuddhiṃ sampādayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2198: etad eva darśayituṃ bhogaiśvarya-prasaktānām iti punar upāttam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2199: phalābhisandhim antareṇa tu kṛtāni jñānopayoginīṃ śuddhim ādadhatīti siddhaṃ vipaścid-avipaścitoḥ phala-vailakṣaṇyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2202: tasmād avyavasāyinaḥ sakāma-karmiṇas tv atimandā ity āha yām imām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2203: puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ puṣpitāṃ viphalatām ivāpātato ramaṇīyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2204: pravadanti prakarṣeṇa sarvataḥ prakṛṣṭā iyam eva veda-vāg iti ye vadanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2205: teṣāṃ tayā vācā apahṛta-cetasāṃ ca vyavasāyātmikā buddhir na vidhīyate iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2206: teṣu tasyā asambhavāt sā teṣu nopadiśyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2209: tatra hetuḥ vedeṣu ye 'rtha-vādāḥ - akṣayyaṃ vai cāturmāsya-yājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2210: apāṃ somam amṛtā ambhūma ity ādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2211: anyad īśvara-tattvaṃ nāstīti prajalpinas te kīdṛśīṃ vācaṃ pravadanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2212: janma-karma-phala-pradāyinīṃ bhogaiśvarya-gatiṃ prati ye kriyā-viśeṣās tān bahu yathā syāt tathā lāti dadāti pratipādayatīti tām //42-43//
GE07bhg4c02u:2213: tataś ca bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānām tayā puṣpitayā vācā apahṛtam ākṛṣṭaṃ ceto yeṣām te /
GE07bhg4c02u:2214: tathā teṣām samādhiś cittaikāgryam parameśvaraikonmukhatvaṃ tasmin niścayātmikā buddhir na vidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2216: sā notpadyata iti bhāvaḥ iti svāmi-vacanaiḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c02u:2217: baladevaḥ : nanv eṣāṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhir bhavet śrutes taulyād iti cec citta-doṣān na bhaved ity āha yām iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2218: avipaścito 'lpa-jñāḥ yām imāṃ jyotiṣṭomena svarga-kāmo yajetety ādikāṃ vācaṃ pravadanti iyam eva prakṛṣṭā vedavāg iti kalpayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2219: tayā vācāpahṛta-cetasāṃ teṣāṃ samādhau manasi vyavasāyātmikā buddhir na vidhīyate nābhyudeti ity anuṣaṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2220: kīdṛśīṃ vācam ity āha puṣpitām iti //
GE07bhg4c02u:2222: evaṃ kutas te vadanti tatrāha vedeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2223: vedeṣu ye vādāḥ apāṃ somam amṛtā ambhūma,
GE07bhg4c02u:2224: akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsya-yājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati ity ādayo 'rthavādās teṣv eva ratāḥ vedasya satya-bhāṣitvād evam evaitad iti pratītimantaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2225: ataeva nānyad iti karma-phalāt svargād anyat jīvāṃśi-paramārtha-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2227: tat-pratipādikānāṃ vedānta-vācāṃ karmāṅga-kartṛ-devatād ekatayā tac-cheṣatvād iti vadana-śīlā ity arthaḥ //42//
GE07bhg4c02u:2229: evaṃ cet tādṛśaṃ mokṣaṃ kuto necchanti tatrāha svargeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2230: svarga eva sudhā devāṅganādy-upetatvena paraḥ śreṣṭho yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c02u:2231: tādṛg-vāsanā-grastatvāt teṣāṃ nānyad bhāṣata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2235: tāni prakarṣeṇāvicchedena dadāti tāṃ bhogaiśvaryayor gatiṃ prāptiṃ prati ye kriyā-viśeṣā jyotiṣṭpmādayas te bahulāḥ pracurā yatra tāṃ vācaṃ vadantīti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2237: aiśvaryaṃ ca devādi-svāmitvaṃ tayor gatim ity arthaḥ //43//
GE07bhg4c02u:2238: baladevaḥ : bhogeti teṣāṃ pūrvoktayor bhogaiśvaryayoḥ prasaktānāṃ kṣayitva-doṣāsphūrtyā
GE07bhg4c02u:2239: tayor abhiniviṣṭānāṃ tayā puṣpitayā vācāpahṛtam viluptaṃ ceto viveka-jñānaṃ yeṣām
GE07bhg4c02u:2241: samyag ādhīyate 'sminn ātma-tattva-yāthātmyam iti nirukteḥ samādhir manas tasminn ity arthaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c02u:2245: śrīdharaḥ : nanu svargādikaṃ paramaṃ phalaṃ yadi na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2246: tarhi kim iti vedas tat-sādhanatayā karmāṇi vidhīyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2248: triguṇātmakāḥ sakāmā ye 'dhikāriṇas tad-viṣayās teṣāṃ karma-phala-sambandha-pratipādakā vedāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2262: nahi dvandvākulasya yoga-kṣema-vyāpṛtasya ca pramādinas traiguṇyātikramaḥ sambhavatīti //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2264: nanu sakāmānāṃ mā bhūd āśaya-doṣād vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2265: niṣkāmānāṃ tu vyavasāyātmaka-buddhyā karma kurvatāṃ karma-svābhāvyāt svargādi-phala-prāptau jñāna-pratibandhaḥ samāna ity āśaṅkyāha traiguṇyeti
GE07bhg4c02u:2266: trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ karma traiguṇyaṃ kāma-mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2267: sa eva prakāśatvena viṣayo yeṣāṃ tādṛśā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍātmakā yo yat-phala-kāmas tasyaiva tat-phalaṃ bodhayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2268: na hi saarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyo darśa-pūrṇamāsāv iti viniyoge 'pi sakṛd-anuṣṭhānāt sarva-phala-prāptir bhavati tat-tat-kāmanāvirahāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2269: yat-phala-kāmanayānutiṣṭhati tad eva phalaṃ tasmin prayoga iti sthitaṃ yogasiddhy-adhikaraṇe /
GE07bhg4c02u:2270: yasmād evaṃ kāmā-virahe phala-virahas tasmāt tvaṃ nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2274: nanu śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-pratīkārāya vastrādy-apekṣaṇāt kuto niṣkāmatvam ata āha nirdvandvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2276: mātrā-sparśās tv ity ukta-nyāyena śītoṣṇādi-dvandva-sahiṣṇur bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2278: rajas-tamobhyām abhibhūta-sattvo hi śītoṣṇādi-pīḍayā mariṣyāmīti manvāno dharmād vimukho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2279: tvaṃ tu rajas tamasī abhibhūya sattva-mātrālambano bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2280: nanu śītoṣṇādi-sahane 'pi kṣut-pipāsādi-pratīkārārthaṃ kiṃcid anupāttam upādeyam
GE07bhg4c02u:2281: upāttaṃ ca rakṣaṇīyam iti tad-arthaṃ yatne kriyamāṇe kutaḥ sattva-sthatvam ity ata
GE07bhg4c02u:2287: na caivaṃ cintā kartavyā katham evaṃ sati jīviṣyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2288: yataḥ sarvāntaryāmī parameśvara eva tava yoga-kṣemādi nirvāhayiṣyatīty āha ātmavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:2289: ātmā paramātmā dhyeyatvena yoga-kṣemādi-nirvāhakatvena ca vartate yasya sa ātmavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:2290: sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena parameśvaram ārādhayato mama sa eva deha-yātrā-mātram apekṣitaṃ sampādayiṣyatīti niścitya niścinto bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2293: tvaṃ tu catur-varga-sādhanebhyo virajya kevalaṃ bhakti-yogam evāśrayasvety āha traiguṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2294: traiguṇyās triguṇātmikāḥ karma-jñānādyāḥ prakāśyatvena viṣayā yeṣāṃ te traiguṇya-viṣayā vedāḥ svārthe ṣyañ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2295: etac ca bhūmnā vyapadeśā bhavanti iti nyāyenoktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2297: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau ity ādi śrutayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2298: pañcarātrādi-smṛtayaś ca gītopaniṣad-gopāla-tāpanyādy-upaniṣadaś ca nirguṇāṃ bhaktim api viṣayīkurvanty eva vedoktatvābhāve bhakter aprāmāṇyam eva syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2299: tataś ca vedoktā ye triguṇamayā jñāna-karma-vidhayas tebhya eva nirgato bhava tān na kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2300: ye tu vedoktā bhakti-vidhayas tāṃs tu sarvathaivānutiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:2308: nirguṇayā mad-bhaktyaiva triguṇātmakebhyas tebhyo niṣkrānto bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2310: ataeva nityaiḥ sattvaiḥ prāṇibhir mad-bhaktair eva saha tiṣṭhatīti tathā saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2311: nityaṃ sattva-guṇastho bhaveti vyākhyāyāṃ nistraiguṇyo bhaeti vyākhyāyāṃ virodhaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2315: yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham it bhakta-vatsalena mayaiva tad-bhāra-vahanāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2319: mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma yat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2321: niṣphalaṃ veti naimittikaṃ nija-karma-phalākāṅkṣyā-rahitam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2322: kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ tu yat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2323: prākṛtaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ man-niṣṭhaṃ nirguṇaṃ smṛtam //
GE07bhg4c02u:2324: vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2329: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā //
GE07bhg4c02u:2330: pathyaṃ pūtam anāyastam āhāryaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2332: sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2334: ity antena granthena traiguṇya-vastūny api bhaktyā svasmin kathañcit sthitasya traiguṇyasya nirjayo 'py uktas tad-anantaram eva / yathā -
GE07bhg4c02u:2335: dravyaṃ deśas tathā kālo jñānaṃ karma ca kārakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2336: śraddhāvasthā-kṛtir niṣṭhā traiguṇyaḥ sarva eva hi //
GE07bhg4c02u:2338: dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anudhyātaṃ buddhyā vā puruṣarṣabha //
GE07bhg4c02u:2343: atrāpy agre kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate iti praśne vakṣyate --
GE07bhg4c02u:2347: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate ity eṣā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2348: nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2349: baladevaḥ : nanu phalanairapekṣyeṇa karmāṇi kurvāṇān api tāni sva-phalair yojayeyus tat svābhāvyāt tataḥ kathaṃ tad-buddheḥ sambhava iti cet tatrāha traiguṇyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2351: guṇa-vacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca iti sūtrāt [Pāṇ 5.1.124] ṣyañ-sakāmatvam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2352: tad-viṣayā vedāḥ karma-kāṇḍāni tvaṃ tu tac-chiro-bhūta-vedānta-niṣṭho nistraiguṇyo niṣkāmo bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2353: ayam arthaḥ - pitṛ-koṭi-vatsalo hi vedo 'nādi-bhagavad-vimukhān māyā-guṇair nibaddhāṃs
GE07bhg4c02u:2354: tad-guṇa-sṛṣṭa-sāttvikādi-sukha-saktān prati tat-kāmān anurudhya phalāni prakāśayan
GE07bhg4c02u:2356: tad-viśrambheṇa tat-pariśīlinas te tan-mūrdha-bhūtopanisat-pratīta-yāthātmya-niścayena tāṃ buddhiṃ yāntīti na cākāmitāny api tāny āpateyuḥ kāmitānām eva teṣāṃ phalatva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2357: na ca sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ traiguṇya-viṣayatvaṃ nistraiguṇyatāyā aprāmāṇikatvāpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2358: nanu śītoṣṇādi-nivāraṇāya mātrāsparśās tu kaunteyety ādi vimarśena dvandva-saho bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2360: nityaṃ yat sattvam apariṇāmitvaṃ jīva-niṣṭhaṃ tat-sthas tad-vibhāvyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2362: alabdha-lābho yogaḥ labdhasya parirakṣaṇaṃ kṣemaṃ tad-rahito bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2363: nanu kṣut-pipāse tathāpi vādhike iti cet tatrāha ātmavān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2364: ātmā viśvambharaḥ paramātmā sa yasya dhyeyatayāsti tādṛśo bhavety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2365: sa te deha-yātrāṃ sampādayed ity arthaḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c02u:2369: śrīdharaḥ : nanu vedokta-nānā-phala-tyāgena niṣāmatayeśvarārādhana-viṣayā vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ kubuddhir evety āśaḍkyāha yāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2370: udakaṃ pīyate yasmiṃs tad udapānaṃ vāpī-kūpa-taḍāg-ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2371: tasmin svalpodaka ekatra kṛtsnārthasyāsambhavāt tatra tatra paribhramaṇena vibhāgaśo
GE07bhg4c02u:2372: yāvān snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavati tāvān sarvo 'py arthaḥ sarvataḥ saṃplutodake
GE07bhg4c02u:2374: evaṃ yāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tat-karma-phala-rūpo 'rthas tāvān sarvo 'pi vijānato vyavasāyātmikā-buddhi-yuktasya brāhmaṇasya brahma-niṣṭhasya bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2376: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2377: tasmād iyam eva subuddhir ity arthaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2379: na caivaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ sarva-kāmanā-parityāgena karma kurvann ahaṃ tais taiḥ karma-janitair ānandair vañcitaḥ syām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2383: yāvān artho yāvat-snāna-pānādi-prayojanaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ saṃplutodake mahati jalāśaye tāvān artho bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2384: yathā hi parvata-nirjharāḥ sarvataḥ sravantaḥ kvacid upatyakāyām ekatra milanti tatra
GE07bhg4c02u:2385: pratyekaṃ jāyamānam udaka-prayojanaṃ samudite sutarāṃ bhavati sarveṣāṃ nirjharāṇām
GE07bhg4c02u:2387: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu vedokteṣu kāmya-karmasu yāvān artho hairaṇyagarbhānanda-paryantas tāvān vijānato brahma-tattvaṃ sākṣāt-kṛtavato brāhmaṇasya brahma-bubhūṣor bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2389: etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrām upajīvanti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2391: tathā ca niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya tavātma-jñānodaye para-brahmānanda-prāptiḥ syāt tathaiva ca sarvānanda-prāptau na kṣudrānanda-prāpti-nibandhana-vaiyagryāvakāśaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2392: ataḥ paramānanda-prāpakāya tattva-jñānāya niṣkāma-karmāṇi kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2393: atra yathā tathā bhavatīti-pada-trayādhyāhāro yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayānuṣaṅgaś ca dārṣṭāntike draṣṭavyaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2395: hanta kiṃ vaktavyaṃ niṣkāmasya nirguṇasya bhaktiyogasya māhātmyaṃ yasyaivārambhaṇa-mātre 'pi nāśa-pratyavāyau na staḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2404: yāvān artha iti kaścit kūpaḥ śauca-karmārthakaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2409: kaścit pānārthaka ity evaṃ sarvataḥ sarveṣudapāneṣu yāvān artho yāvanti prayojanānīty arthaḥ tasmin ekasminn eva śaucādi-karma-siddheḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2410: kiṃ ca, tat-tat-kūpeṣu pṛthak pṛthak paribhramaṇa-śrameṇa,
GE07bhg4c02u:2412: tathā kūpeṣu virasa-jalena sarovare tu surama-jalenaivety api viśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2413: evaṃ sarveṣu vedeṣu tat-tad-devatārādhanena yāvanto 'rthās tāvanta ekasya bhagavad-ārādhanena vijānato vijñasya brāhmaṇasyeti brahma vedaṃ bettīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2414: brahmaṇas tasya vijānato vedajñatve 'pi veda-tātparyaṃ bhaktiṃ viśeṣato jānataḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2418: daivīṃ māyāṃ tu śrī-kāmaḥ ity ādy-uktyā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2421: iti meghādy-amiśrasya saura-kiraṇasya tīvratvam iva bhaktiyogasya jñāna-karmādy-amiśratvaṃ tīvratvaṃ jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2422: atra bahubhyo bahu-kāma-siddhir iti sarvathā bahu-buddhitvam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2423: ekasmād bhagavata eva sarva-kāma-siddhir ity aṃśenaika-buddhitvād eka-buddhitvam eva viṣaya-sādguṇyāj jñeyam //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2424: baladevaḥ : mami sarvān vedān adhīyānasya bahu-kāla-vyayād bahu-vikṣepa-sambhavāc ca kathaṃ tad-buddher abhudayas tatrāha yāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2426: vistīrṇe udapāne jalāśaye snānādy-arthino yāvān snāna-pānādir arthaḥ prayojanaṃ tāvān eva sa tena tasmāt sampadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2427: evaṃ sarveṣu sopaniṣatsu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vedādhyāyino vijānata ātma-yāthātmya-jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2428: labdhu-kāmasya yāvān taj-jñāna-siddhi-lakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ syāt tāvān eva tena tebhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2430: tathā ca sva-śākhayaiva sopaniṣadācireṇaiva tat siddhau tad buddhir abhudiyād eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2431: iha dārṣṭāntike 'pi yāvāṃs tāvān iti pada-dvayam anuṣañjanīyam //46//
GE07bhg4c02u:2433: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana /
GE07bhg4c02u:2434: mā karma-phala-hetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2435: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi sarvāṇi karma-phalāni parameśvarārādhanād eva bhaviṣyantīty abhisandhāya pravarteta /
GE07bhg4c02u:2436: kiṃ karmaṇā ity āśaṅkya tad vārayann āha karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2439: nanu karmaṇi kṛti tat-phalaṃ syād eva bhojane kṛte tṛptivat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2442: karma-phalaṃ pravṛtti-hetur yasya sa tathābhūto mā bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2443: kāmyamānasyaiva svargāder niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvād akāmitaṃ phalaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2444: ataeva phalaṃ bandhakaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe 'pi tava saṅgo niṣṭhā māstu //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2446: nanu niṣkāma-karmabhir ātma-jñānaṃ sampādya parānanda-prāptiḥ kriyate ced ātma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c02u:2447: eva tarhi sampādyaṃ kiṃ bahvāyāsaiḥ karmabhir bahiraṅga-sādhana-bhūtair ity āśaṅkyāha karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2448: te tavāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya tāttvika-jñānotpatty-ayogyasya karmaṇy evāntaḥkaraṇa-śodhake 'dhikāro mayedaṃ kartavyam iti bodho 'stu na jñāna-niṣṭhā-rūpaṃ vedānta-vākya-vicārādau /
GE07bhg4c02u:2449: karma ca kurvatas tava tat-phaleṣu svargādiṣu kadācana kasyāṃcid apy avasthāyāṃ karmānuṣṭhānāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ tat-kāle vādhikāro mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti bodho māstu /
GE07bhg4c02u:2450: nanu mayedaṃ bhoktavyam iti buddhy-abhāve 'pi karma sva-sāmārthyād eva phalaṃ janayiṣyatīti cen nety āha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2451: phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya heteur utpādako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2452: tvaṃ tu niṣkāmaḥ san karma-phala-hetur mā bhūḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2453: na hi niṣkāmena bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kṛtaṃ karma phalāya kalpata ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2454: phalābhāve kiṃ karmaṇety ata āha - mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2455: yadi phalaṃ neṣyate kiṃ karmaṇā duḥkha-rūpeṇety akaraṇe tava prītir mā bhūt //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2457: evam ekam evārjunaṃ sva-priya-sakhaṃ lakṣīkṛtya jñāna-bhakti-karma-yogān ācikhyāsur
GE07bhg4c02u:2458: bhagavān jñāna-bhakti-yogau procya tayor arjunasyānadhikāraḥ vimṛśya niṣkāma-karma-yogam āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2459: mā phaleṣv iti - phalākāṅkṣiṇo 'py atyanta-śuddha-cittā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2460: tvaṃ tu prāyaḥ śuddha-citta iti mayā jñātvaivocyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2461: nanu karmaṇi kṛte phalam avaśyaṃ bhaviṣyaty eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2462: tatrāha mā karma-phala-hetur bhūḥ phala-kāmanayā hi karma kurvan phalasya hetur utpādako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2463: tvaṃ tu tādṛśo mā bhūr ity āśīr mayā dīyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2464: akarmaṇi sva-dharmākaraṇe vikarmaṇi pāpe vā saṅgas tava māstu,
GE07bhg4c02u:2465: kintu dveṣa evāstv iti punar apy āśīr dīyata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2466: atrāgrimādhyāye vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me ity arjunokti-darśanād atrādhyāye pūrvottara-vākyānām avatārikābhir nātīva saṅgatir vidhitsiteti jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2468: tathā tvam api mad-ājñāyāṃ tiṣṭheti kṛṣṇārjunayor mano 'nulāpo 'yam atra draṣṭavyaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2469: baladevaḥ : nanu karmabhir jñāna-siddhir iṣyate cet tarhi tasya śamādīny evāntaraṅgatvād anuṣṭheyāni santu kiṃ bahu prayāsais tair iti cet tatrāha - karmaṇy eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2471: te tava sva-dharme 'pi yuddhe 'dharma-buddher aśuddha-cittasya tāvat karmasv eva
GE07bhg4c02u:2472: yuddhādiṣv adhikāro 'stu mayaitāni bhoktavyānīti tat phaleṣu bandhakeṣu tavādhikāro
GE07bhg4c02u:2474: nanu phalecchā-virahe 'pi tāni sva-phaair yojayeyur iti cet tatrāha mā karmeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2475: karma-phalānāṃ hetur utpādakas tvaṃ mābhūḥ kāmanayā kṛtāni tāni sva-phalair yojayanti kāmitānām eva phalānāṃ niyojya-viśeṣaṇatvena phalatvāmnātāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2476: ataeva bandhakāni phalāni āpatiṣyantīti bhayād akarmaṇi karmākaraṇe tava saṅgaḥ prītir māstu kintu vidveṣa evāstv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2477: niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi yaṣṭidhānyavad antar eva jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ niṣpādayiṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2478: śamādīni tu tat-pṛṣṭha-lagnāny eva syur iti bhāvaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c02u:2480: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya /
GE07bhg4c02u:2481: siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2486: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2487: tat-phalasya jñānasyāpi siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā kevalam īśvarāśrayeṇaiva kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2488: yata evaṃbhūtaṃ samatvam eva yoga ucyate sadbhiḥ citta-samādhāna-rūpatvāt //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2491: he dhanañjaya tvaṃ yogasthaḥ san saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā karmāṇi kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2492: atra bahu-vacanāt karmaṇy evādhikāras ta ity atra jātāv eka-vacanam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2493: saṅga-tyāgopāyam āha siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā phala-siddhau harṣaṃ phalāsiddhau ca viṣādaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhana-buddhyā karmāṇi kurv iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2495: atra tu yoga-sthaḥ karmāṇi kurv ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2496: ataḥ katham etad boddhyṃ śakyam ity ata āha samatvaṃ yoga ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2497: yad etat siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatvam idam eva yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenocyate na tu karmeti na ko 'pi virodha ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2498: atra pūrvārdhasyottarārdhena vyākhyānaṃ kriyata ity apaunaruktyam iti bhāṣyakārīyaḥ panthāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2499: sukha-duḥkhe same kṛtvā ity atra jayājaya-sāmyena yuddha-mātra-kartavyatā prakṛtatvād uktā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2503: tena jayājayayos tulya-buddhiḥ san saṅgrāmam eva sva-dharmaṃ kurv iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2507: tvaṃ saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ ca tyaktvā yogasthaḥ san karmāṇi kuru yuddhādīni /
GE07bhg4c02u:2513: tad-anuṣaṅga-phalānāṃ jayādīnāṃ siddhāv asiddhau ca samo bhūtvā rāga-dveṣa-rahitaḥ san kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2514: idam eva samatvaṃ mayā yoga-stha ity atra yoga-śabdenoktaṃ citta-samādhi-rūpatvāt //48//
GE07bhg4c02u:2516: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhi-yogād dhanaṃjaya /
GE07bhg4c02u:2518: śrīdharaḥ : kāmyaṃ tu karmātinikṛṣṭam ity āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2519: buddhyā vyavasāyātmikayā kṛtaḥ karma-yogo buddhi-yogo buddhi-sādhana-bhūto vā,
GE07bhg4c02u:2520: tasmāt sakāśād anyat sādhana-bhūtaṃ kāmyaṃ karma dūreṇa avaraṃ atyantam apakṛṣṭaṃ hi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2521: yasmād evaṃ tasmād buddhau jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ karma-yogam anviccha anutiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c02u:2522: yad vā buddhau śaraṇaṃ trātāram īśvaram āśrayety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2523: phalahetur astu sakāmā narāḥ kṛpaṇā dīnāḥ yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ //49//
GE07bhg4c02u:2525: nanu kiṃ karmānuṣṭhānam eva puruṣārtho yena niṣphalam eva sadā kartavyam ity ucyate prayojanam anuddiśya na mando 'pi pravartate iti nyāyāt
GE07bhg4c02u:2526: tad varaṃ phala-kāmanayaiva karmānuṣṭhānam iti cen nety āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2527: buddhi-yogād ātma-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogād dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram adhamaṃ karma phalābhisandhinā kriyamāṇaṃ janma-maraṇa-hetu-bhūtam
GE07bhg4c02u:2528: athavā paramātma-buddhi-yogād dūreṇāvaraṃ sarvam api karma yasmād,
GE07bhg4c02u:2530: tasmād buddhau paramātma-buddhau sarvānartha-nivartikāyāṃ śaraṇaṃ pratibandhaka-pāpa-kṣayeṇa rakṣakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kartum iccha
GE07bhg4c02u:2531: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avaraṃ karma kurvanti te kṛpaṇāḥ sarvadā janma-maraṇādi-ghaṭī-yantra-bhramaṇena para-vaśā atyanta-dīnā
GE07bhg4c02u:2532: ity arthaḥ / yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvā asmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇa [BAU 3.8.10] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2533: tathā ca tvam api kṛpaṇo mā bhūḥ kintu sarvānartha-nivartakātma-jñānotpādakaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam evānutiṣṭhety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2534: yathā hi kṛpaṇā janā atiduḥkhena dhanam arjayanto yat kiṃcid dṛṣṭa-sukha-mātra-lobhena
GE07bhg4c02u:2535: dānādi-janitaṃ mahat sukham anubhavituṃ na śaknuvantīty ātmānam eva vañcayanti tathā
GE07bhg4c02u:2536: mahatā duḥkhena karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ kṣudra-phala-mātra-lobhena paramānandā-nubhavena
GE07bhg4c02u:2537: vañcitā ity aho daurbhāgyaṃ mauḍhyaṃ ca teṣām iti kṛpaṇa-padena dhvanitam //49 //
GE07bhg4c02u:2543: baladevaḥ : atha kāmya-karmaṇo nikṛṣṭatvam āha dūreṇeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2546: ātma-yāthātmya-buddhi-sādhana-bhūtān niṣkāma-karma-yogāt dūreṇātiviprakarṣeṇāvaram atyapakṛṣṭaṃ janma-maraṇādy-anartha-nimittaṃ kāmyaṃ karmety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2547: hi yasmād evam atas tvaṃ buddhau tad-yāthātmya-jñāne śaraṇam āśrayaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam anviccha kuru /
GE07bhg4c02u:2548: ye tu phala-hetavaḥ phala-kāmā avara-karma-kāriṇas te kṛpaṇās tat-phala-janma-karmādi-pravāha-paravaśā dīnā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2549: tathā ca tvaṃ kṛpaṇo mābhūr iti iha kṛpaṇāḥ khalu kaṣṭopārjita-vittādṛṣṭa-sukha-lava-lubdhā
GE07bhg4c02u:2550: vittāni dātum asamarthā mahatā dāna-sukhena vañcitās tathā kaṣṭānuṣṭhita-karmāṇas
GE07bhg4c02u:2554: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2555: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yoga-yuktas tu śreṣṭha ity āha buddhi-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2557: te ubhe ihaiva janmani parameśvara-prasādena tyajati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2558: tasmād yogāya tad-arthāya karma-yogāya yujyasva ghaṭasva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2560: sva-dharmākhyeṣu karmasu vartamānasya yā siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samatva-buddhir īśvarārpita-cetastayā tat kauśalaṃ kuśala-bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2561: tad dhi kauśalaṃ yad bandha-svabhāvāny api karmāṇi samatva-buddhyā svabhāvān nivartante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2564: evaṃ buddhi-yogābhāve doṣam uktvā tad-bhāve guṇam āha buddhīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2565: iha karmasu buddhi-yuktaḥ samatva-buddhyā yukto jahāti parityajati ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte puṇya-pāpe sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa /
GE07bhg4c02u:2566: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt samatva-buddhi-yogāya tvaṃ yujyasva ghaṭasvodyukto bhava /
GE07bhg4c02u:2567: yasmād īdṛśaḥ samatva-buddhi-yoga īśvarārpita-cetasaḥ karmasu pravartamānasya kauśalaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2568: kuśala-bhāvo yad-bandha-hetūnām api karmaṇāṃ tad-abhāvo mokṣa-paryavasāyitvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c02u:2570: samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ karmātmāpi san duṣṭa-karma-kṣayaṃ karotīti mahā-kuśalaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2571: tvaṃ tu na kuśalo yataś cetano 'pi san sajātīya-duṣṭa-kṣayaṃ na karoṣīti vyatireko 'tra dhvanitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2572: athavā iha samatva-buddhi-yukte karmaṇi kṛte sati sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa buddhi-yuktaḥ paramātma-sākṣātkāravān sañjahāty ubhe sukṛta-duṣkṛte
GE07bhg4c02u:2574: yasmāt karmasu madhye samatva-buddhi-yuktaḥ karma-yogaḥ kauśalaṃ kuśalo duṣṭa-karma-nivāraṇa-catura ity arthaḥ //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2577: yataḥ karmasu sakāma-niṣkāmeṣu madhye yoga evodāsīnatvena karma-karaṇam eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2579: baladevaḥ : uktasya buddhi-yogasya prabhāvam āha buddhīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2580: iha karmasu yo buddhi-yuktaḥ pradhāna-phala-tyāga-viṣayānuṣaṅga-phala-siddhy-asiddhi-samatva-viṣayayā ca buddhyā yuktas tāni karoti,
GE07bhg4c02u:2581: sa ubhe anādi-kāla-sañcite jñāna-pratibandhake sukṛta-duṣkṛte jahāti vināśayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2584: kauśalam cāturyaṃ bandhakānām eva buddhi-samparkād viśodhita-viṣa-pārada-nyāyena mocakatvena pariṇāmāt //50//
GE07bhg4c02u:2586: karmajaṃ buddhi-yuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2588: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇāṃ mokṣa-sādhanatva-prakāram āha karma-jam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2589: karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ karma kurvāṇo manīṣiṇo jñānino
GE07bhg4c02u:2590: bhūtvā janma-rūpeṇa bandhena vinirmuktāḥ santo 'nāmayaṃ sarvopadrava-rahitaṃ viṣṇoḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2593: nanu duṣkṛta-hānam apekṣitaṃ na tu sukṛta-hānaṃ puruṣārtha-bhraṃśāpatter ity āśaṅkya tuccha-phala-tyāgena parama-puruṣārtha-prāptiṃ phalam āha karma-jam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2594: samatva-buddhi-yuktā hi yasmāt karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhanārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2595: karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ sattva-śuddhi-dvāreṇa manīṣiṇas tat tvam asi ity ādi-vākya-janyātma-manīṣāvanto bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2596: tādṛśāś ca santo janmātmakena bandhena vinirmuktā viśeṣeṇātyantikatva-lakṣaṇena niravaśeṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2597: muktāḥ padaṃ padanīyam ātma-tattvam ānanda-rūpaṃ brahmānāmayam avidyā-tat-kāryātmaka-roga-rahitābhayaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2598: mokṣākhyaṃ puruṣārthaṃ gacchanty abhedena prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2599: yasmād evaṃ phala-kāmanāṃ tyaktvā samatva-buddhyā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhantas taiḥ kṛtāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhayas
GE07bhg4c02u:2601: mokṣākhyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ gacchanti tasmāt tvam api yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2602: brūhi tan me [Gītā 2.7] ity ukteḥ śreyo jijñāsur evaṃvidhaṃ karma-yogam anutiṣṭheti
GE07bhg4c02u:2606: buddhi-yuktās tādṛśa-buddhimantaḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmāṇy anutiṣṭhanto manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2609: tasmāt tvam api śreyo jijñāsur evaṃ vidhāni karmāṇi kurv iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2613: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2614: śrīdharaḥ : kadāhaṃ tat padaṃ prāpsyāmi ity apekṣāyām āha yadeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2619: evaṃ parameśvarārādhane kriyamāṇe yadā tat-prasādena tava buddhir dehābhimāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2620: moha-mayaṃ gahanaṃ durgaṃ viśeṣeṇātitariṣyati tadā śrotavyasya śrutasya cārthasya
GE07bhg4c02u:2622: tayor anupādeyatvena jijñāsām na kariṣyasīty arthaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2624: evaṃ karmāṇy anutiṣṭhataḥ kadā me sattva-śuddhiḥ syād ity ata āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2625: na hy etāvatā kālena sattva-śuddhir bhavatīti kāla-niyamo 'sti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2626: kintu yadā yasmin kāle te tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ vyatitariṣyati avivekātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2627: kāluṣam aham idaṃ mamedaṃ ity ādy-ajñāna-vilasitam atigahanam vyatikramiṣyati rajas-tamo-malam
GE07bhg4c02u:2629: tadā tasmin kāle śrotavyasya śrutasya ca karma-phalasya nirvedaṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ gantāsi prāptāsi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2630: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedam āyāt [MuṇḍU 1.2.12] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2633: evaṃ parameśvarārpita-niṣkāma-karmābhyāsāt tava yogo bhaviṣyatīty āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2634: tava buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ moha-rūpaṃ gahanaṃ viśeṣato 'tiśayena tariṣyati,
GE07bhg4c02u:2635: tadā śrotavyasya śrotavyeṣv artheṣu śrutasya śruteṣv apy artheṣu nirvedaṃ prāpsyasi asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanayor naṣṭatvāt kiṃ me śāstropadeśa-vākya-śravaṇena
GE07bhg4c02u:2636: sāmprataṃ me sādhaneṣv eva pratikṣaṇam abhyāsaḥ sarvathocita iti maṃsyasa iti bhāvaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2637: baladevaḥ : nanu niṣkāmāṇi karmāṇi kurvato me kadātma-viṣayā manīṣābhyudiyād iti cet tatrāha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2638: yadā te buddhir antaḥkaraṇaṃ moha-kalilaṃ tuccha-phalābhilāṣa-hetum ajñāna-gahanaṃ vyatitariṣyati parityakṣyatīty arthaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2639: tadā pūrvaṃ śrutasyānantaraṃ śrotavyasya ca tasya tuccha-phalasya sambandhinaṃ nirvedaṃ gantāsi gamiṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2640: parīkṣya lokān karma-citān brāhmaṇo nirvedaṃ āyāt iti śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2641: nirvedena phalena tad-viṣayāṃ tāṃ pariceṣyati iti nāsty atra kāla-niyama ity arthaḥ //52//
GE07bhg4c02u:2644: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasyi //53//
GE07bhg4c02u:2647: itaḥ pūrvaṃ vikṣiptā satī tava buddhir yadā samādhau sthāsyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2648: samādhīyate cittam asminn iti samādhiḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2651: abhyāsa-pāṭavena tatraiva sthirā ca satī yogaṃ yoga-phalaṃ tattva-jñānam avāpsyasi //53//
GE07bhg4c02u:2653: antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhyaivaṃ jāta-nirvedasya kadā jñāna-prāptir ity apekṣāyām āha śrutīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2654: te tava buddhiḥ śrutibhir nānā-vidha-phala-śravaṇair avicārita-tātparyair vipratipannā 'neka-vidha-saṃśaya-viparyāsavattvena vikṣiptā prāk /
GE07bhg4c02u:2655: yadā yasmin kāle śuddhija-viveka-janitena doṣa-darśanena taṃ vikṣepaṃ parityajya
GE07bhg4c02u:2657: satī sthāsyati laya-vikṣepa-lakṣaṇau doṣau parityajya samāhitā bhaviṣyatīti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2658: athavā niścalāsambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanā-rahitācalā dīrgha-kālādara-nairantarya-satkāra-sevanair vijātīya-pratyayādūṣitā satī nirvāta-pradīpavad ātmani sthāsyatīti yojanā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2661: tadā punaḥ sādhyāntarābhāvāt kṛta-kṛtyaḥ sthita-prajño bhaviṣyasīty abhiprāyaḥ //53//
GE07bhg4c02u:2663: tataś ca śrutiṣu nānā-laukika-vaidikārtha-śravaṇeṣu vipratipannā asammatā viraketit yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2664: tatra hetuḥ niścalā teṣu teṣv artheṣu calituṃ vimukhībhūtety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2668: baladevaḥ : nanu karma-phala-nirviṇṇatayā karmānuṣṭhānena labdha-hṛd-viśuddher abhyuditātma-jñānasya me kadātma-sākṣāt-kṛtir iti cet tatrāha śrutīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2669: śrutyā karmaṇāṃ jñāna-garbhatāṃ prabodhayantyā tam etam ity ādikayā vipratipannā
