GE07bhg4c02u:2670: viśeṣeṇa saṃsiddhā te buddhir acalā asambhāvanā-viparīta-bhāvanābhyāṃ virahitā yadā
GE07bhg4c02u:2671: samādhau manasi nirvāta-dīpa-śikheva niścalā sthāsyati tadā yogam ātmānubhava-lakṣaṇam avāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2672: ayam arthaḥ phalābhilāṣa-śūnyatayānuṣṭhitāni karmāṇi sthita-prajñatā-rūpāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ sādhayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2677: sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim //54//
GE07bhg4c02u:2678: śrīdharaḥ : pūrva-ślokoktasyātma-tattva-jñasya lakṣaṇaṃ jijñāsur arjuna uvāca - sthita-prajñasyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2680: ataeva sthitā niścalā prajñā buddhir yasya tasya bhāṣā kā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2681: bhāṣyate 'nayā iti bhāṣā lakṣaṇam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:2682: sa kena lakṣaṇena sthita-prajña ucyate ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2683: tathā sthita-dhīḥ kiṃ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇam āsanaṃ vrajanaṃ ca kuryād ity arthaḥ //54//
GE07bhg4c02u:2685: evam labdhāvasaraḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇaṃ jñātum arjuna uvāca /
GE07bhg4c02u:2686: yāny eva hi jīvan-muktānāṃ lakṣaṇāni tāny eva mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣopāya-bhūtānīti manvānaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2687: sthitā niścalā ahaṃ-brahmāsmi iti prajñā yasya sa sthita-prajño 'vasthā-dvayavān samādhistho vyutthita-cittaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2688: ato viśinaṣṭi samādhi-sthasya sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2691: samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kena lakṣaṇenānyair vyavahriyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2692: sa ca vyutthita-cittaḥ sthita-dhīḥ sthita-prajñaḥ svayaṃ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2695: tathā kim āsīteti vyutthita-citta-nigrahāya kathaṃ bahir indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ karoti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2696: tan-nigrāhābhāva-kāle kiṃ vrajeta kathaṃ viṣayān prāpnoti ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2698: tad evaṃ catvāraḥ praśnāḥ samādhi-sthe sthita-prajña ekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2700: keśaveti sambodhayan sarvāntaryāmitayā tvam evaitādṛśaṃ rahasyaṃ vaktuṃ samartho 'sīti sūcayati //54//
GE07bhg4c02u:2702: samādhāv acalā buddhir iti śrutvā tattvato yogino lakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchati sthita-prajñasyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2704: kā bhāṣā ? bhāṣyate 'nayeti bhāṣā lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2708: kiṃ prabhāṣeteti sukha-duḥkhayor mānāpamānayoḥ stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayor vā samupasthitayoḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2709: spaṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā kiṃ vaded ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2710: kim āsīta ? tad indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanābhāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2713: baladevaḥ : evam ukto 'rjunaḥ pūrva-padyoktasya sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ jñātuṃ pṛcchati sthiteti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2716: tathā hi - sthitā sthirā prajña dhīr yasya tasya samādhi-sthasya kā bhāṣā kiṃ lakṣaṇam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2719: tathā vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kathaṃ bhāṣaṇādīni kuryāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2722: svayoḥ stuti-nindayoḥ sneha-dveṣayoś ca prāptayor mukhataḥ svagataṃ vā kiṃ brūyāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2723: kim āsīta bāhya-viṣayeṣu katham indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ kuryāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2725: kiṃ tan-nigrāhābhāve ca kathaṃ viṣayānavāpnuyād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2729: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha mano-gatān /
GE07bhg4c02u:2731: śrīdharaḥ : atra ca yāni sādhakasya jñāna-sādhanāni tāny eva svābhāvikāni siddhasya lakṣaṇāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:2732: ataḥ siddhasya lakṣaṇāni kathayann evāntaraṅgāni jñāna-sādhanāny āha yāvad adhyāya-samāpti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2734: manasi sthitān kāmān yadā prakarṣeṇa jahāti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2736: ātmany eva svasminn eva paramānanda-rūpe ātmanā svayam eva tuṣṭa ity ātmārāmaḥ san yadā kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣāṃs tyajati tadā tena lakṣaṇena muniḥ sthita-prajña ucyate //55//
GE07bhg4c02u:2738: eteṣāṃ catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaraṃ bhagavān uvāca prajahātīti yāvad-adhyāya-samāpti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2740: tantrāntare pañcadhā prapañcitān sarvān niravaśeṣān prakarṣeṇa kāraṇa-bādhena yadā
GE07bhg4c02u:2741: jahāti parityajati sarva-vṛtti-śūnya eva yadā bhavati sthita-prajñas tadocyate samādhistha iti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2742: kāmānām anātma-dharmatvena parityāga-yogyatām āha manogatān iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2743: yadi hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā na tyaktuṃ śakyeran vahny-auṣṇyavat svābhāvikatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2745: atas tat-parityāgena parityaktuaṃ śakyā evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2746: nanu sthita-prajñasya mukha-prasāda-liṅga-gamyaḥ santoṣa-viśeṣaḥ pratīyate sa kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2747: sarva-kāma-parityāge syād ity āha - ātmany eva paramānanda-rūpe na tv anātmani tuccha
GE07bhg4c02u:2748: ātmnaā svaprakāśa-cid-rūpeṇa bhāsamānena na tu vṛttyā tuṣṭaḥ paritṛptaḥ parama-puruṣārtha-lābhāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2750: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2751: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute // [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2752: tathā ca samādhi-sthaḥ sthita-prajña evaṃvidhair lakṣaṇa-vācibhiḥ śabdair bhāṣyata iti prathama-praśnasyottaram //55//
GE07bhg4c02u:2754: catūrṇāṃ praśnānāṃ krameṇottaram āha prajahātīti yāvad adhyāya-samāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2755: sarvān iti kasminn apy arthe yasya kiṃcin mātro 'pi nābhilāṣa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2756: mano-gatān iti kāmānām ātma-dharmatvena parityāge yogyatā darśitā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2757: yadi te hy ātma-dharmāḥ syus tadā tāṃs tyaktum aśakyeran vahner auṣṇyavad iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2758: tatra hetuḥ - ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi prāpto ya ātmānanda-rūpas tena tuṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2760: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2761: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute // [KaṭhU 2.3.14] iti //55//
GE07bhg4c02u:2762: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān krameṇa catūrṇāṃ uttaram āha yāvad adhyāya-pūrtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2765: yadā mano-gatān manasi sthitān kāmān sarvān prajahāti saṃtyajati tadā sthita-prajña ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2767: ātma-dharmatve duḥśakyaḥ sa syād vahny-uṣṇatādīnām iveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2768: nanu śuṣka-kāṣṭhavat kathaṃ tiṣṭhatīti cet tatrāha ātmany eveti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2769: ātmani pratyāhṛte manasi bhāsamānena sva-prakāśānanda-rūpeṇātmanā svarūpeṇa tuṣṭaḥ paritṛptaḥ kṣudra-viṣayābhilāṣān saṃtyajyātmānandārāmaḥ samādhisthaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2778: duḥkheṣu prāpteṣv api anudvignam akṣubhitaṃ mano yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2780: tatra hetuḥ - vītā apagatā rāga-bhaya-krodhā yasmāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2784: idānīṃ vyutthitasya sthita-prajñasya bhāṣaṇopaveśana-gamanāni mūḍha-jana-vilakṣaṇāni vyākhyeyāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:2785: tatra kiṃ prabhāṣetety asyottaram āha duḥkheṣv iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2788: prārabdha-pāpa-karma-prāpiteṣu nodvignaṃ duḥkha-parihārākṣamatayā vyākulaṃ na bhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:2790: avivekino hi duḥkha-prāptau satyām aho pāpo 'haṃ dhiṅ māṃ durātmānam etādṛśa-duḥkha-bhāginaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2791: ko me duḥkham īdṛśaṃ nirākuryād ity anutāpātmako bhrānti-rūpas tāmasaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣa udvegākhyo jāyate
GE07bhg4c02u:2792: / yady ayaṃ pāpānuṣṭhāna-samaye syāt tadā tat-pravṛtti-pratibandhakatvena saphalaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2793: bhoga-kāle tu bhavan kāraṇe sati kāryasyocchettum aśakyatvān niṣprayojano duḥkha-kāraṇe
GE07bhg4c02u:2794: saty api kim iti mama duḥkhaṃ jāyate iti avivekaja-bhrama-rūpatvān na vivekinaḥ sthita-prajñasya sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2795: duḥkha-mātraṃ hi prārabdha-karmaṇā prāpyate na tu tad-uttara-kālīno bhramo 'pi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2796: nanu duḥkhāntara-kāraṇatvāt so 'pi prārabdha-karmāntareṇa prāpyatām iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c02u:2798: yathā-kathaṃcid deha-yātrā-mātra-nirvāhaka-prārabdha-karma-phalasya bhramābhāve 'pi bādhitānuvṛttyopapatter iti vistareṇāgre vakṣyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2799: tathā sukheṣu sattva-pariṇāma-rūpa-prītyātmaka-citta-vṛtti-viśeṣeṣu trividheṣu prārabdha-puṇya-karma-prāpiteṣu vigata-spṛha āgāmi-taj-jātīya-sukha-spṛhā-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:2800: spṛhā hi nāma sukhānubhava-kāle taj-jātīya-sukhasya kāraṇaṃ dharmam ananuṣṭhāya vṛthaiva tad-ākāṅkṣā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttir bhrāntir eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2802: na hi kāraṇābhāve kāryaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2803: ato yathā sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ mā bhūd iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpa udvego vivekino na sambhavati
GE07bhg4c02u:2804: tathaivāsati kāraṇe kāryaṃ bhūyād iti vṛthākāṅkṣā-rūpā tṛṣṇātmikā spṛhāpi nopapadyate
GE07bhg4c02u:2808: aho dhanyo 'haṃ yasya mamedṛśaṃ sukham upasthitaṃ ko vā mayā tulas tribhuvane kena vopāyena mamedṛśaṃ sukhaṃ na vicchidyetety evam ātmikotphullatā-rūpā tāmasī citta-vṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2809: ataevoktaṃ bhāṣye - nāgnir ivendhanādy-ādhāne yaḥ sukhāny anuvivardhate sa vigata-spṛhaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2810: vakṣyati ca -- na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam [Gītā 5.20] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2814: rāga-viṣayasya nāśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇāsāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasya dainyātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣo bhayam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2815: evaṃ rāga-viṣaya-vināśake samupasthite tan-nivāraṇa-sāmarthyam ātmano manyamānasyābhijvalanātmakaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ krodhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2816: te sarve viparyaya-rūpatvād vigatā yasmāt sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2817: etādṛśo munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī sthita-prajña ucyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2818: evaṃ-lakṣaṇaḥ sthita-dhīḥ svānubhava-prakaṭanena śiṣya-śikṣārtham anudvega-nispṛhatvādi-vācaḥ prabhāṣeta ity anvaya uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2819: evaṃ cānyo 'pi mumukṣur duḥkhe nodvijet sukhe na prahṛṣyet,
GE07bhg4c02u:2822: kiṃ prabhāṣetety asya uttaram āha duḥkheṣu kṣut-pipāsa-jvara-śiro-rogādiṣv ādhyātmikeṣu
GE07bhg4c02u:2823: sarpa-vyāghrādy-utthiteṣv anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdhaṃ duḥkham idaṃ mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyam
GE07bhg4c02u:2824: iti svagataṃ kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ san spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvan /
GE07bhg4c02u:2828: sudhiyā paricito bhraṣṭa evocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2829: evaṃ sukheṣv apy upasthiteṣu vigata-spṛha iti prārabdham idam avaśya-bhogyam iti svagataṃ spaṣṭaṃ ca bruvāṇasya tasya sukha-spṛhā-rāhitya-liṅgaṃ sudhiyā gamyam eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2830: tat-tal-liṅgam eva spaṣṭīkṛtya darśayati vīto vigato rāgo 'nurāgaḥ sukheṣu bandhu-janeṣu yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2832: pārśvaṃ prāpitasya svaccheda-cikīrṣor vṛṣala-rājān na bhayam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2834: baladevaḥ : atha vyutthitaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ kiṃ bhāṣetety asyottaram āha duḥkheṣv iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2835: trividheṣv adhyātmikādiṣu duḥkheṣu samutthiteṣu satsv anudvigna-manāḥ prārabdha-phalāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2836: amūni mayāvaśyaṃ bhoktavyānīti kenacit pṛṣṭaḥ svagataṃ vā bruvan tebhyo nodvijata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2837: sukheṣu cottamāhāra-satkārādinā samupasthiteṣu vigata-spṛhas tṛṣṇā-śūnyaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭāny
GE07bhg4c02u:2838: amūni mayāvaśya-bhoktavyānīti kenacit pṛṣṭaṃ svagataṃ vā bruvan tair upasthitaḥ prahṛṣṭa-mukho
GE07bhg4c02u:2841: vīta-bhayaḥ viṣayāpahartṛṣu prāpteṣu durlabhasya mamaitāni dharmyair bhavadbhir hriyanta iti dainya-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2842: vīta-krodhaḥ teṣv eva prabalasya mamaitāni tucchair bhavadbhiḥ katham apahartavyānīti
GE07bhg4c02u:2844: evaṃvidho munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2845: itthaṃ svānubhavaṃ parān prati svagataṃ vā vadan naudvego nispṛhatādi-vacaḥ prabhāṣate ity uttaram //56//
GE07bhg4c02u:2847: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham /
GE07bhg4c02u:2848: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2849: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ bhāṣeta ity asyottaram āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2850: yaḥ sarvatra putra-mitrādiṣv apy anabhisnehaḥ sneha-varjitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2851: ataeva bādhitānuvṛttyā tat tat śubham anukūlaṃ prāpya nābhinandati aśubhaṃ pratikūlaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi na nindati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2855: sarva-deheṣu jīvanādiṣv api yo munir anabhisnehaḥ,
GE07bhg4c02u:2856: yasmin saty anyadīye hāni-vṛddhī svasminn āropyete sa tādṛśo 'nya-viṣayaḥ premāpara-paryāyas tāmaso vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ snehaḥ sarva-prakāreṇa tad-rahito 'nabhisnehaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2857: bhagavati paramātmani tu sarvathābhisnehavān bhaved eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2859: tat-tat-prārabdha-karma-pariprāpitaṃ śubhaṃ sukha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya nābhinandati harṣa-viśeṣa-puraḥsaraṃ na praśaṃsati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2860: aśubhaṃ duḥkha-hetuṃ viṣayaṃ prāpya na dveṣṭi antar-asūyā-pūrvakaṃ na nindati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2861: ajñasya hi sukha-hetur yaḥ sva-kalatrādiḥ sa śubho viṣayas tad-guṇa-kathanādi-pravartikā dhī-vṛttir bhrānti-rūpābhinandaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2864: evam asūyotpādanena duḥkha-hetuḥ parakīya-vidyā-prakarṣādir enaṃ pratyaśubho viṣayas tan-nindādi-pravartikā bhrānti-rūpā dhī-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2867: tāv abhinanda-dveṣau bhrānti-rūpau tāmasau katham abhrānte śuddha-sattve sthita-prajñe sambhavatām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2869: harṣa-viṣāda-rahitasya muneḥ prajñā paramātma-tattva-viṣayā pratiṣṭhitā phala-paryavasāyinī sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2872: aśubhaṃ prāpya na ninded ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2873: atra ca nindā-praśaṃsādi-rūpā vāco na prabhāṣeteti vyatireka uktaḥ //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2875: anabhisnehaḥ sopādhi-sneha-śūnyo dayālutvān nirupādhir īṣan-mātra-snehas tu tiṣṭhed eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2876: tat tat prasiddhaṃ sammāna-bhojanādibhyaḥ sva-paricaraṇaṃ śubhaṃ prāpyāśubham anādaraṇaṃ muṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya krameṇa nābhinandati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2877: na praśaṃsati tvaṃ dhārmikaḥ paramahaṃsa-sevī sukhī bhaveti na brūte /
GE07bhg4c02u:2878: na dveṣṭi tvaṃ pāpātmā narake pateti nābhiśapati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2879: tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā samādhiṃ prati sthitā susthira-prajñā ucyata ity arthaḥ //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2880: baladevaḥ : ya iti sarveṣu prāṇiṣu anabhisneha aupādhika-sneha-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2881: kāruṇikatvān nirupādhir īṣad-snehas tv asty eva /
GE07bhg4c02u:2882: tat tat prasiddhaṃ śubham uttama-bhojana-srak-candanārpaṇa-rūpaṃ prāpya nābhinandati tad-arpakaṃ prati dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ ciraṃ jīveti na vadati
GE07bhg4c02u:2883: aśubham apamānaṃ yaṣṭi-prahārādikaṃ ca prāpya na dveṣṭi,
GE07bhg4c02u:2885: tasya prajñeti sa sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2886: atra stuti-nindā-rūpaṃ vaco na bhāṣata iti vyatirekeṇa tal lakṣaṇam //57//
GE07bhg4c02u:2891: yadā cāyaṃ yogī indriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sakāśād indriyāṇi saṃharate sarvata evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭha indriyāṇīnidryārthebhyaḥ sarva-viṣayebhyaḥ upasaṃharate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2895: idānīṃ kim āsīteti praśnasyottaraṃ vaktum ārabhate bhagavān ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2896: tatra prārabdha-karma-vaśād vyutthānena vikṣiptānīndriyāṇi punar upasaṃhṛtya samādhy-artham eva sthita-prajñasyopaveśanam iti darśayitum āha yadeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2897: ayaṃ vyutthitaḥ sarvaśaḥ sarvāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2903: adhunā tu punaḥ samādhy-avasthāyāṃ sakala-vṛtty-abhāva iti viśeṣaḥ //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2907: svādhīnānām indriyāṇāṃ bāhya-viṣayeṣu calanaṃ niṣidhyāntareva niścalatayā sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2909: kūrmo 'ṅgāni mukha-netrādīni yathā svāntar eva svecchayā sthāpayati //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2910: baladevaḥ : atha kim āsītety asyottaram āha yadety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir /
GE07bhg4c02u:2911: ayaṃ yogī yadā cendriyārthebhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ svādhīnānīndriyāṇi śrotrādīny anāyāsena saṃharati samākarṣati tadā tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2913: mukha-kara-caraṇāni yathānāyasena kamaṭhaḥ saṃharati tadvat viṣayebhyaḥ samākṛṣṭendriyāṇām antaḥ-sthāpanaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam //58//
GE07bhg4c02u:2916: rasa-varjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate //59//
GE07bhg4c02u:2917: śrīdharaḥ : nanu nendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv apravṛttir sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2918: jaḍānām āturāṇām upavāsa-parāṇāṃ ca viṣayeṣv pravṛtter aviśeṣāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:2921: nirāhārasya indriyāir viṣaya-grahaṇam akurvato dehino dehābhimānino 'jñasya rāgo 'bhilāṣas tad-varjaṃ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2923: yad vā nirāhārasya upavāsa-parasya viṣayāḥ prāyaśo nivartante kṣudhā-santaptasya śabda-sparśādy-apekṣābhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c02u:2924: kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasāpekṣā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2927: nanu mūḍhasyāpi rogādi-vaśād viṣayebhya indriyāṇām upasaṃharaṇaṃ bhavati tat kathaṃ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitety uktam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:2929: nirāhārasya indriyāir indriyāir viṣayān anāharato dehino dehābhimānavato mūḍhasyāpi
GE07bhg4c02u:2930: rogiṇaḥ kāṣṭha-tapasvino vā viṣayāḥ śabdādayo vinivartante kintu rasa-varjaṃ rasa-tṛṣṇā taṃ varjayitvā /
GE07bhg4c02u:2931: ajñasya viṣayā nivartante tad-viṣayo rāgas tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2932: asya tu sthita-prajñasya paraṃ puruṣārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad evāham asmīti sākṣātkṛtya sthitasya raso 'pi kṣudra-sukha-rāgo 'pi nivartate /
GE07bhg4c02u:2934: tathā ca yāvān artha ity ādau vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c02u:2935: evaṃ ca sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttiḥ sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇam iti na mūḍhe vyabhicāra ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2937: tasmāt sa-rāga-viṣayocchedikāyāḥ samyag-darśanātmikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ sthairyaṃ mahatā yatnena sampādayed ity abhiprāyaḥ //59//
GE07bhg4c02u:2939: mūḍhasyāpi upavāsato rogādi-vaśād vendriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣv acalanaṃ sambhavet tatrāha viṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2941: abhilāṣas tu viṣayeṣu na nivartanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2942: asya sthita-prajñasya tu paraṃ paramātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣayeṣv abhilāṣo nivartata iti na lakṣaṇa-vyabhicāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2945: baladevaḥ : nanu mūḍhasyāmaya-grastasya viṣayeṣv indriyāpravṛtti-dṛṣṭā tat katham etat sthita-prajñasya lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāha viṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2946: nirāhārasya roga-bhayād bhojanādīny akurvato mūḍhasyāpi dehino janasya viṣayās tad-anubhavā vinivartante /
GE07bhg4c02u:2947: kintu raso rāga-tṛṣṇā tad-varjaṃ viṣaya-tṛṣṇā tu na nivartata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2948: asya sthita-prajñasya tu raso 'pi viṣaya-rāgo 'pi viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sva-prakāśānandam
GE07bhg4c02u:2949: ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvānubhūya nivartate vinaśyatīti sa-rāga-viṣaya-nivṛttis tasya lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c02u:2952: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2954: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamaṃ vinā sthita-prajñatā na sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:2955: ataḥ sādhakāvasthāyāṃ tatra mahān prayatnaḥ kartavya ity āha yatato hy apīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:2961: tatra prajñā-sthairye bāhyendriya-nigraho mano-nigrahaś cāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad-ubhayābhāve
GE07bhg4c02u:2962: prajñā-nāśa-darśanād iti vaktuṃ bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve prathamaṃ doṣam āha yatata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2964: yatato bhūyo bhūyo viṣaya-doṣa-darśanātmakaṃ yatnaṃ kurvato 'pi,
GE07bhg4c02u:2965: cakṣiṅo ṅitva-karaṇād anudātteto 'nāvaśyakam ātmanepadam iti jñāpanāt parasmaipadam aviruddham /
GE07bhg4c02u:2966: vipaścito 'tyanta-vivekino 'pi puruṣasya manaḥ kṣaṇa-mātraṃ nirvikāraṃ kṛtam apīndriyāṇi haranti vikāraṃ prāpayanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2967: nanu virodhinī viveke sati kuto vikāra-prāptis tatrāha pramāthīni pramathana-śīlāni atibalīyastvād vivekopamardana-kṣamāṇi /
GE07bhg4c02u:2968: ataḥ prasabhaṃ prasahya balātkāreṇa paśyaty eva vipaściti svāmini viveke ca rakṣake
GE07bhg4c02u:2969: sati sarva-pramāthītvād evendriyāṇi vivekaja-prajñāyāṃ praviṣṭaṃ manas tataḥ pracyāvya
GE07bhg4c02u:2972: prasiddho hy ayam artho loke yathā pramāthino dasyavaḥ prasabham eva dhaninaṃ dhana-rakṣakaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:2973: cābhibhūya tayoḥ paśyator eva dhanaṃ haranti tathendriyāṇy api viṣaya-sannidhāne
GE07bhg4c02u:2977: na tv indriyāṇi parāvartayituṃ sarvathā śaktir ity āha yatata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2979: baladevaḥ : athāsyā jñāna-niṣṭhayā daurlabhyam āha yatato hīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2980: vipaścito viṣayātma-svarūpa-vivekajñasya tata indriya-jaye prayatamānasyāpi puruṣasya indriyāṇi śrotrādīni kartṝṇi manaḥ parasabhaṃ balād iva haranti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2982: nanu virodhini viveka-jñāne sthite kathaṃ haranti tatrāha pramāthīnīti ati-baliṣṭhatvāt taj-jñānopamardana-kṣamāṇīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2983: tasmāt caurebhyo mahā-nidher ivendriyebhyo jñāna-niṣṭhāyāḥ saṃrakṣaṇaṃ sthita-prajñasyāsanam iti //60//
GE07bhg4c02u:2985: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2986: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2988: yukto yogī tāni indriyāṇi saṃyamya mat-paraḥ sann āsīta /
GE07bhg4c02u:2990: etena ca katham āsīteti praśnasya vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:2992: evaṃ tarhi tatra kaḥ pratīkāra ity ata āha tānīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2993: tānīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi jñāna-karma-sādhana-bhūtāni saṃyamya vaśīkṛtya yuktaḥ samāhito nigṛhīta-manāḥ sann āsīta nirvāpāras tiṣṭhet /
GE07bhg4c02u:2994: pramāthināṃ kathaṃ sva-vaśīkaraṇam iti cet tatrāha mat-para iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2995: ahaṃ sarvātmā vāsudeva eva para utkṛṣṭa upādeyo yasya sa mat-para ekānta-mad-bhakta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:2996: tathā coktam na vāsudeva-bhaktānām aśubhaṃ vidyate kvacit iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:2997: yathā hi loke balavantaṃ rājānam āśritya dasyavo nigṛhyante rājāśrito 'yam iti jñātvā
GE07bhg4c02u:2998: ca svayam eva tad-vaśyā bhavanti tathaiva bhagavantaṃ sarvāntaryāminam āśritya tat-prabhāveṇaiva
GE07bhg4c02u:2999: duṣṭānīndriyāṇi nigrāhyāṇi punaś ca bhagavad-āśrito 'yam iti matvā tāni tad-vaśyāny
GE07bhg4c02u:3005: tad etad vaśīkṛtendriyaḥ sann āsīteti kim āsīteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:3008: mad-bhaktiṃ vinā naivendriya-jaya ity agrima-granthe 'pi sarvatra draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3012: athāta ānanda-dughaṃ padāmbujaṃ haṃsāḥ śrayeran // [BhP 11.29.1-2] iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3013: vaśe hīti sthita-prajñasyendriyāṇi vaśībhūtāni bhavantīti sādhakād viśeṣa uktaḥ //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:3014: baladevaḥ : nanu nirjitendriyāṇām apy ātmānubhavo na pratītas tatra ko 'bhyupāya iti cet tatrāha tānīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3015: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya mat-paro man-niṣṭhaḥ san yuktaḥ kṛtāma-samādhir āsīta tiṣṭheta /
GE07bhg4c02u:3019: tathā citta-sthito viṣṇur yogināṃ sarva-kilbiṣam // [ViP 6.7.74] ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c02u:3021: itthaṃ ca vaśīkṛtendriyatayāvasthitiḥ kim āsītety asyottaram uktam //61//
GE07bhg4c02u:3027: śrīdharaḥ : bāhyendriya-saṃyamābhāve doṣam uktvā manaḥ-saṃyamābhāve doṣam āha dhyāyata iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:3028: guṇa-buddhyā viṣayān dhyāyataḥ puṃsaḥ teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3029: āsaktyā ca teṣu adhikaḥ kāmo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3030: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodho bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3038: nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi śabdādīnviṣayān dhyāyato manasā punaḥ punaś cintayataḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3039: puṃsas teṣu viṣayeṣu saṅga āsaṅgo mamātyantaṃ sukha-hetava eta ity evaṃ śobhanādhyāsa-lakṣaṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3040: prīti-viśeṣa upajāyate saṅgāt sukha-hetutva-jñāna-lakṣaṇāt saṃjāyate kāmo mamaite
GE07bhg4c02u:3042: tasmāt kāmāt kutaścit pratihanyamānāt tat-pratighāta-viṣayaḥ krodho 'bhijvalanātmābhijāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3044: saṃmohāt smṛti-vibhramaḥ smṛteḥ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusandhānasya vibhramo vicalanaṃ vibhraṃśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3045: tasmāc ca smṛti-bhraṃśād buddher aikātmyākāra-mano-vṛtter nāśo viparīta-bhāvanopacaya-doṣeṇa pratibandhād anutpattir utpannāyāś ca phalāyogyatvena
GE07bhg4c02u:3046: / buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati tasyāś ca phala-bhūtāyā buddher vilopāt praṇaśyati sarva-puruṣārthāyogyo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3047: yo hi puruṣārthāyogyo jātaḥ sa mṛta eveti loke vyavahriyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3049: yasmād evaṃ manaso nigrahābhāve nigṛhīta-bāhyendriyasyāpi paramānartha-prāptis taramān mahatā prayatnena mano nigṛhṇīyād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3050: ato yuktam uktaṃ tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīteti //62-63//
GE07bhg4c02u:3052: sthita-prajñasya mano-vaśīkāra eva bāhyendriya-vaśīkāra-kāraṇaṃ sarvathā mano-vaśīkārābhāve tu yat syāt tat śṛṇv ity āha dhyāyata iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3060: baladevaḥ : vijitendriyasyāpi mayy aniveśita-manasaḥ punar anartho durvāra ity āha dhyāyata iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c02u:3061: viṣayān śabdādīn sukha-hetutva-buddhyā dhyāyataḥ punaḥ punaś cintayato yoginas teṣu saṅga āsaktir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3063: kāmāc ca kenacit pratihatāt krodhaś citta-jvālas tat-pratighātako bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3067: buddhi-nāśāt praṇaśyati punar viṣaya-bhoga-nimagno bhavati saṃsaratīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3068: madanāśrayaṇād durbalaṃ manas tāni sva-viṣayair yojayantīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3073: śrīdharaḥ : nanv indriyāṇāṃ viṣaya-pravaṇa-svabhāvānāṃ niroddhum aśakyatvād ayaṃ doṣo duṣparihara iti sthita-prajñatvaṃ kathaṃ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c02u:3075: rāga-dveṣa-rahitaiḥ vigata-darpair indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś carann upabhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ śāntiṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3077: ātmano manasaḥ vaśyair indriyaiḥ vidheyo vaśavartī ātmā mano yasyeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3078: anenaiva kathaṃ vrajetety asya caturtha-praśnasya svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān gacchatīty uttaram uktaṃ bhavati //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:3080: manasi nigṛhīte tu bāhyendriya-nigrahābhāve 'pi na doṣa iti vadan kiṃ vrajetety asyottaram āhāṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3081: yo 'samāhita-cetāḥ sa bāhyendriyāṇi nigṛhyāpi rāga-dveṣa-duṣṭena manasā viṣayāṃś cintayan puruṣārthād bhraṣṭo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3083: vaśīkṛtāntaḥ-karaṇas tu ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnaiḥ svādhīnair iti vā rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3084: viyuktair virahitair indriyaiḥ śrotrādibhir viṣayān śabdādīn aniṣiddhāṃś carann upalabhamānaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3085: prasādaṃ prasannātāṃ cittasya svacchatāṃ paramātma-sākṣātkāra-yogyatām adhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3090: na doṣam āvahatīti na śuddhi-vyāghāta iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3091: etena viṣayāṇāṃ smaraṇam api ced anartha-kāraṇaṃ sutarāṃ tarhi bhogas tena jīvanārthaṃ viṣayān bhuñjānaḥ katham anarthaṃ na pratipadyeteti śaṅkā nirastā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3092: svādhīnair indriyair viṣayān prāpnotīti ca kiṃ vrajeteti praśnasyottaram uktaṃ bhavati //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:3094: mānasa-viṣaya-grahaṇābhāve sati sva-vaśyair indriyair viṣaya-grahaṇe 'pi na doṣa iti vadan sthita-prajño vrajeta kim ity asyottaram āha rāgeti
GE07bhg4c02u:3095: vidheyo vacane sthta ātmā mano yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3098: prasādam adhigacchatīty etādṛśasyādhikāriṇo viṣaya-grahaṇam api na doṣa iti kiṃ vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c02u:3100: sthita-prajñasya viṣaya-tyāga-svīkārāv eva āsana-vrajane te ubhe api tasya bhadre iti bhāvaḥ //64//
GE07bhg4c02u:3101: baladevaḥ : manasi nirjite śrotrādi-nirjayābhāvo 'pi na doṣa iti bruvan vrajeta kim ity asottaram āha rāgeti ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3102: vijita-bahir-indriyo 'pi mad-anarpita-manāḥ paramārthād vicyuta ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3103: yo vidheyātmā svādhīna-manā mad-arpita-manās tata eva nidagdha-rāgādi-mano-malaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3104: sa tv ātma-vaśyair mano 'dhīnair ata eva rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ viyuktair indriyaiḥ śrotrādyair
GE07bhg4c02u:3105: viṣayān niṣiddhān śabdādīṃś caran bhuñjāno 'pi prasādaṃ viṣayāsakty-ādi-malānāgamād
GE07bhg4c02u:3110: śrīdharaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity atrāha prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3112: tataś ca prasanna-cetaso buddhiḥ pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīty arthaḥ //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:3114: prasādam adhigacchatīty uktaṃ tatra prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity ucyate prasāda iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3115: cittasya prasāde svacchatva-rūpe sati sarva-duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ajñāna-vilasitānāṃ hānir vināśo 'sya yater upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3116: hi yasmāt prasanna-cetaso yater āśu śīghram eva buddhir brahmātmaikyākārā paryavatiṣṭhate pari samantād avatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati viparīta-bhāvanādi-pratibandhābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c02u:3117: tataś ca prasāde sati buddhi-paryavasthānaṃ tatas tad-virodhy-ajñāna-nivṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3118: tatas tat-kārya-sakala-duḥkha-hānir iti krame 'pi prasāde yatrādhikyāya sarva-duḥkha-hāni-karatva-kathanam iti na virodhaḥ //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:3120: buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sarvato-bhāvena svābhīṣṭaṃprati sthirī-bhavatīti viṣaya-grahaṇābhāvād api samucita-viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ tasya sukham iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3122: tayā vinā tu na citta-prasāda iti prathama-skandha eva prapañcitam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3124: baladevaḥ : prasāde sati kiṃ syād ity āha asya yogino manaḥ prasāde sati sarveṣāṃ prakṛti-saṃsarga-kṛtānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ hānir upajāyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3125: prasanna-cetasaḥ svātma-yāthātmya-viṣayā buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate sthirā bhavati //65//
GE07bhg4c02u:3127: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3128: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:3135: bhāvanayā hi buddher ātmani pratiṣṭhā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c02u:3137: na cābhāvayataḥ ātma-dhyānam akurvataḥ śāntiḥ ātmani cittoparamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3138: aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:3141: ayuktasyājita-cittasya buddhir ātma-viṣayā śravaṇa-mananākhya-vedānta-vicāra-janyā nāsti notpadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3144: na cābhāvayata ātmānaṃ śāntiḥ sakāryāvidyā-nivṛtti-rūpā vedānta-vākya-janyā brahmātmaikya-sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3145: aśāntasyātma-sākṣātkāra-śūnyasya kutaḥ sukhaṃ mokṣānanda ity arthaḥ //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:3152: baladevaḥ : pūrvoktam arthaṃ vyatireka-mukhenāha ayuktasyāyogino mad-aniveśita-manaso buddhir ukta-lakṣaṇā nāsti na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3154: tādṛśam ātmānam abhāvayataḥ śāntir viṣaya-tṛṣṇā-nivṛttir nāsti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3155: aśāntasya tat-tṛṣṇākulasya sukham sva-prakāśānandātmānubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ kutaḥ syāt //66//
GE07bhg4c02u:3158: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:3159: śrīdharaḥ : nāsti buddhir ayuktasya [Gītā 2.66] ity atra hetum āha indriyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3160: indriyāṇām avaśīkṛtānāṃ svairaṃ viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yadaivaikam indriyaṃ mano 'nuvidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3162: tadaivaikam indriyasya manasaḥ puruṣasya vā prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati viṣaya-vikṣiptāṃ karoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3163: kim uta vaktavyaṃ bahūni prajñāṃ harantīti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3164: yathā pramattasya karṇadhārasya nāvaṃ vāyuḥ sarvataḥ paribhramayati tadvad iti //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:3166: ayuktasya kuto nāsti buddhir ity ata āha indriyāṇām iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3167: caratāṃ sva-viṣayeṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu pravartamānānām avaśīkṛtānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekam apīndriyam anulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate preryate pravartate iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c02u:3169: tat indriyam ekam api manasānusṛtam asya sādhakasya manaso vā prajñām ātma-viṣayāṃ śāstrīyāṃ harati apanayati manasas tad-viṣayāviṣṭatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3170: yadaikam apīndriyaṃ prajñāṃ harati tadā sarvāṇi harantīti kim u vaktavyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3172: abhyasyeti vāyor naukā-haraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ na bhuvīti sūcayitum ambhasīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3173: evaṃ dārṣṭāntike 'py ambhaḥ-sthānīye manaś cāñcalye saty eva prajñā-haraṇa-sāmarthyam indriyasya na tu bhū-sthānīye manaḥ-sthairya iti sūcitam
GE07bhg4c02u:3175: ayuktasya buddhir nāstīty upapādayati indriyāṇāṃ sva-sva-viṣayeṣu caratāṃ madhye yan mama ekam indriyam anuvidhīyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3177: tad eva mano 'sya prajñāṃ buddhiṃ harati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3180: viṣayeṣu caratām avijitānām indriyāṇāṃ madhye yad ekaṃ śrotraṃ vā cakṣur vānulakṣyīkṛtya mano vidhīyate pravartate,
GE07bhg4c02u:3181: tad ekam evendriyaṃ manasānugatam asya pravartakasya prajñāṃ viviktātma-viṣayāṃ haraty apanayati manasasas tad-viṣayākṛṣṭatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3183: pratikūlo vāyur yathāmbhasi nīyamānāṃ nāvaṃ tadvat //67//
GE07bhg4c02u:3187: śrīdharaḥ : indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñatve sādhanatvaṃ coktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3188: sādhanatvopasaṃhāre tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā jñātavyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3190: iti sambodhayan vairi-nigrahe samarthasya tavātrāpi sāmarthyaṃ bhaved iti sūcayati //68//
GE07bhg4c02u:3194: he mahābāho iti sambodhayan sarva-śatru-nivāraṇa-kṣamatvād indriya-śatru-nivāraṇe 'pi tvaṃ kṣamo 'sīti sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3197: indriya-saṃyamasya sthita-prajñaṃ prati lakṣaṇatvasya mumukṣuṃ prati prajñā-sādhanatvasya copasaṃharaṇīyatvāt //68//
GE07bhg4c02u:3205: he mahābāho iti yathā ripūn nigṛhṇāsi tathendriyāṇi nigṛhāṇety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3206: ebhiḥ ślokair bhagavan-niviṣṭatayendriya-vijayaḥ sthita-prajñasya siddhasya svābhāvikaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3209: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GE07bhg4c02u:3210: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3211: śrīdharaḥ : nanu na kaścid api prasupta iva darśanādi-vyāpāra-śūnyaḥ sarvātmanā nigṛhītendriyo loke dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3212: ato 'saktāvitam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ity āśaṅkyāha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3216: tasyāṃ ātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ saṃyamī nigṛhītendriyo jāgrati prabudhyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:3218: tasyāṃ darśanādi-vyāpāras tasya nāsti ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3219: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yathā divāndhānām ulukādīnāṃ rātrāv eva darśanaṃ na tu divase /
GE07bhg4c02u:3224: tad evaṃ mumukṣuṇā prajñā-sthairyāya prayatna-pūrvakam indriya-saṃyamaḥ kartavya ity uktaṃ sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ siddha eva sarvendriya-saṃyama ity āha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3225: yā vedānta-vākya-janita-sākṣātkāra-rūpāhaṃ brahmāsmīti prajñā sarva-bhūtānām ajñānāṃ niśeva niśā tān praty aprakāśa-rūpatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3226: tasyāṃ brahma-vidyā-lakṣaṇāyāṃ sarva-bhūta-niśāyāṃ jāgarti ajñāna-nidrāyāḥ prabuddhaḥ san sāvadhāno vartate saṃyamīndriya-saṃyamavān sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3227: yasyāṃ tu dvaita-darśana-lakṣaṇāyām avidyā-nidrāyāṃ prasuptāny eva bhūtāni jāgrati
GE07bhg4c02u:3228: svapnavad vyavaharanti sā niśā na prakāśata ātma-tattvaṃ paśyato 'parokṣatayā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya /
GE07bhg4c02u:3229: yāvad dhi na prabudhyate tāvad eva svapna-darśanaṃ bodhya-paryantatvād bhramasya tattva-jñāna-kāle
GE07bhg4c02u:3232: kāraka-vyavahāre hi śuddhaṃ vastu na vīkṣyante /
GE07bhg4c02u:3233: śuddhe vastuni siddhe ca kāraka-vyāpṛtis tathā //
GE07bhg4c02u:3235: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānām ity avocat svayaṃ hariḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3236: tathā ca yasya viparīta-darśanaṃ tasya na vastu-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśanasya vastv-adarśana-janyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3237: yasya ca vastu-darśanaṃ tasya na viparīta-darśanaṃ viparīta-darśana-kāraṇasya vastv-adarśanasya vastu-darśanena bādhitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3238: tathā ca śrutiḥ - yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyet /
GE07bhg4c02u:3239: yatra svasya sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet //
GE07bhg4c02u:3241: yathā kākasya rātry-andhasya dinam ulūkasya divāndhasya niśā rātrau paśyataś colūkasya yad dinaṃ rātrir eva sā kākasyeti mahad āścaryam etat
GE07bhg4c02u:3242: atas tattva-darśibhiḥ katham āvidyaka-kriyā-kārakādi-vyavahāraḥ syād iti svataḥ siddha eva tasyendriya-saṃyama ity arthaḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3244: sthita-prajñasya tu svataḥ-siddha eva sarvendriya-nigraha ity āha yeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3245: buddhir hi dvividhā bhavati ātma-pravaṇā viṣaya-pravaṇā ca /
GE07bhg4c02u:3246: tatra yā ātma-pravaṇā buddhiḥ sā sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3247: niśāyāṃ kiṃ kiṃ syād iti tasyāṃ svapanto janā yathā na jānanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:3248: tathaiva ātma-pravaṇa-buddhau prāpyamāṇaṃ vastu sarva-bhūtāni na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3253: tan-niṣṭhaṃ viṣaya-sukha-śoka-mohādikaṃ sākṣād anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3254: sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā tan-niṣṭhaṃ kim api nānubhavati ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3255: kintu paśyataḥ sāṃsārikānāṃ sukha-duḥkha-pradān viṣayān tatraudāsīnyenāvalokayataḥ svabhogyān
GE07bhg4c02u:3256: viṣayān api yathocitaṃ nirlepam ādadānasyety arthaḥ //69//
GE07bhg4c02u:3257: baladevaḥ : sādhakāvasthasya sthita-prajñasyendriya-saṃyamaḥ prayatna-sādhya ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3258: siddhāvasthasya tu tasya tan-niyamaḥ svābhāvika ity āha yā niśeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3260: yātma-niṣṭhā buddhiḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ niśā-rūpakeṇopamātra vyajyate rātri-tulyā tadvad aprakāśikā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3261: rātrāv ivātma-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau svapanto janās tal-labhyam ātmānaṃ sarve nānubhavantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3262: saṃyamī jitendriyas tu tasyāṃ jāgarti na tu svapiti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3264: yasyāṃ viṣya-niṣṭhāyāṃ buddhau bhūtānio jāgrati viṣaya-bhogān anubhavanti na tu tatra svapanti sā muneḥ sthita-prajñasya niśā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3275: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭy-abhāve katham asau tān bhuṅkte ity apekṣāyām āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3276: nānā-nada-nadīnbhir āpūryamāṇam api acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādam eva samudraṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3277: punar api anyā āpo yathā praviśanti tathā kāmā viṣayā yaṃ munim antar-dṛṣṭiṃ bhogair
GE07bhg4c02u:3278: avikriyamāṇam eva prārabdha-karmabhir ākṣiptāḥ santaḥ praviśanti sa śāntim kaivalyaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3281: etādṛśasya sthita-prajñasya sarva-vikṣepa-śāntir apy artha-siddheti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3282: sarvābhir nadībhir āpūryamāṇaṃ santaṃ vṛṣṭy-ādi-prabhavā api sarvā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3284: acalānāṃ mainākādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhā yasminn iti vā gāmbhīryātiśaya uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3285: yadvad yena prakāreṇa nirvikāratvena tadvat tenaiva nirvikāratva-prakāreṇa yaṃ sthita-prajñaṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3286: nirvikāram eva santaṃ kāmā ajñair lokaiḥ kāmyamānāḥ śabdādyāḥ sarve viṣayā avarjanīyatayā
GE07bhg4c02u:3287: prārabdha-karma-vaśāt praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ śaknuvanti sa mahā-samudra-sthānīyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3290: / na kāma-kāmī kāmān viṣayān kāmayituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa kāma-kāmy ajñaḥ śāntiṃ samākhyātāṃ nāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3291: api tu sarvadā laukikālaukika-karma-vikṣepeṇa mahati kleśārṇave magno bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3292: etena jñānina eva phala-bhūto vidvat-saṃnyāsas tasyaiva ca sarva-vikṣepa-nivṛtti-rūpā jīvan-muktir daivāddhnīna-viṣaya-bhoge 'pi nirvikāratety-ādikam uktaṃ veditavyam //70//
GE07bhg4c02u:3294: viṣaya-grahaṇe kṣobha-rāhityam eva nirlepety āha āpūryamāṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3295: yathā varṣāsu itas tataḥ nādeyā āpaḥ samudraṃ praviśanti kīdṛśam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3296: ā īṣad api āpūryamāṇam tāvatībhir apy adbhiḥ pūrayituṃ na śakyam /
GE07bhg4c02u:3297: acala-pratiṣṭham anatikrānta-maryādaṃ tadvad eva kāmā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti bhogyatvenāyānti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3298: yathā apāṃ praveśe apraveśe vā samudro na kam api viśeṣam āpadyate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3299: evam eva yaḥ kāmānāṃ bhoge abhoge ca kṣobha-rahita eva syāt sa sthita-prajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3301: baladevaḥ : uktaṃ bhāvaṃ sphuṭayann āha āpūryeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3302: svarūpeṇaivāpūryamāṇaṃ tathāpy acala-pratiṣṭham anullaṅghita-velaṃ samudraṃ yathāpo 'nyā varṣodbhavā nadyaḥ praviśanti,
GE07bhg4c02u:3303: na tu tatra kiñcid viśeṣaṃ śaknuvanti kartuṃ,
GE07bhg4c02u:3304: tadvat sarve kāmāḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭā viṣayā yaṃ praviśanti na tu vikartuṃ prabhavanti sa śāntim āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3305: śabdādiṣu tad indriya-gocareṣv api sat svātmānandānubhava-tṛptair vikāra-leśam apy avindan sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3306: yaḥ kāma-kāmī viṣaya-lipsuḥ sa tūkta-lakṣaṇāṃ śāntiṃ nāpnoti //70//
GE07bhg4c02u:3308: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3311: prāptān kāmān vihāya tyaktvopekṣya aprāpteṣu ca niḥspṛhaḥ yato nirahaṅkāro 'taeva tad-bhoga-sādhaneṣu nirmamaḥ sann antar-dṛṣṭir bhūtvā yaś carati prārabdha-vaśena bhogān bhuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c02u:3316: prāptān api sarvān bāhyān gṛha-kṣetrādīnāntarān manorājya-rūpān vāsanā-mātra-rūpāṃś
GE07bhg4c02u:3317: ca pathi gacchaṃs tṛṇa-sparśa-rūpān kāmāṃs trividhān vihāyopekṣya śarīra-jīvana-mātre 'pi nispṛhaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c02u:3318: yato nirahaṅkāra śarīrendriyādāv ayam aham ity abhimāna-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3321: mamedam ity abhimāna-varjitaḥ san yaḥ pumāṃś carati prārabdha-karma-vaśena bhogān
GE07bhg4c02u:3322: bhuṅkte yādṛcchikatayā yatra kvāpi gacchatīti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3323: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ sthita-prajñaḥ śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāra-duḥkhoparama-lakṣaṇām avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttim adhigacchati jñāna-balena prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3327: kaścit tu kāmeṣu aviśvasan naiva tān bhuṅkte ity āha /
GE07bhg4c02u:3328: vihāyeti nirahaṅkāro nirmama iti deha-daihikeṣu ahaṃtā-mamatā-śūnyaḥ //71//
GE07bhg4c02u:3330: prāptān kāmān viṣayān sarvān vihāya śarīropajīvana-mātre 'pi nirmamo mamtā-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c02u:3331: nirahaṅkāro 'nātmani śarīre ātmābhimāna-śūnyaś carati tad-upajīvana-mātraṃ bhakṣayati
GE07bhg4c02u:3332: yatra kvāpi gacchati vā sa śāntiṃ labhate iti vrajeta kim ity asyottaram //71 //
GE07bhg4c02u:3334: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3336: śrīdharaḥ : uktāṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3339: enāṃ parameśvarārādhanena viśuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān prāpya na vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3341: yato 'nta-kāle mṛtyu-samaye 'py asyāṃ lakṣa-mātram api sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇam brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam ṛcchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3342: kiṃ punar vaktavyaṃ bālyam ārabhya sthitvā prāpnotīti //72//
GE07bhg4c02u:3348: tad evaṃ caturṇāṃ praśnānām uttara-vyājena sarvāṇi sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇāni mumukṣu-kartavyatayā kathitāni /
GE07bhg4c02u:3349: samprati karma-yoga-phala-bhūtāṃ sāṅkhya-niṣṭhāṃ stuvann upasaṃharati eṣeti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3351: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir iti ca prāg uktā sthitir niṣṭhā sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-paramātma-jñāna-lakṣaṇā brāhmī brahma-viṣayā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3353: enāṃ sthitiṃ prāpya yaḥ kaścid api pnar na vimuhyati /
GE07bhg4c02u:3354: na hi jñāna-bādhitasyājñānasya punaḥ sambhavo 'sti anāditvenotpatty-asambhavāt /
GE07bhg4c02u:3355: asyāṃ sthitāv anta-kāle 'pi antye 'pi vaayasi sthitvā brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛttiṃ brahma-rūpaṃ nirvāṇam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c02u:3357: kim u vaktavyaṃ yo bramacaryād eva saṃnyasya yāvaj-jīvam asyāṃ brāhmyāṃ
GE07bhg4c02u:3358: sthitāv avatiṣṭhate sa brahma-nirvāṇam ṛcchatīty api-śabdārthaḥ //72//
GE07bhg4c02u:3367: jñānaṃ karma ca vispaṣṭam aspaṣṭaṃ bhaktim uktavān /
GE07bhg4c02u:3374: kiṃ punar ākaumāraṃ brahma ṛcchati labhate /
GE07bhg4c02u:3375: nirvāṇam amṛta-rūpaṃ tat pradam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c02u:3376: nanu tasyāṃ sthitaḥ kathaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c02u:3379: niṣkāma-karmabhir jñānī harim eva smaran bhavet /
GE07bhg4c02u:3383: [*ENDNOTE] This is a reference to chapter 11.25. See VCT to 18.28.
